kabinet over thuiswerken  We sorteren zo veel mogelijk voor op hybride werken na de Corona periode  Bij RVO willen we zoveel mogelijk plaatsonafhankelijk werken  Dit betekent dat je als uitgangspunt vanaf iedere locatie je werk kunt doen  vanuit huis  op een andere locatie en of op kantoor   RVO verwacht van jou wel dat je bereid bent om naar kantoor Utrecht Assen te komen wanneer dit nodig is voor de uitvoering van je werk  Na sluitingsdatum zal de vacaturetekst en de gegevens van de vacaturehouder online niet meer zichtbaar zijn  Om te voorkomen dat je deze moet opvragen  verzoeken wij je de vacaturetekst te downloaden en te bewaren  Meer over de functiegroep Senior Medewerker Iv Door het Functiegebouw Rijk worden medewerkers en leidinggevenden geholpen bij het maken van resultaat  en ontwikkelafspraken in functioneringsgesprekken en krijgt men inzicht in de loopbaanmogelijkheden binnen de Rijksoverheid  Meer informatie op Functiegebouw Rijksoverheid Meer over jouw toekomstige afdeling Afdeling Data RVO werkt in al haar processen en activiteiten met data   ten behoeve van de belangen van klanten  opdrachtgevers  o a  ministeries  en de eigen organisatie  De afdeling Data vervult hierbij kaderstellende  adviserende en uitvoerende taken  voor heel RVO  Door data te ontsluiten  te verbinden en te analyseren ontstaat informatie die van belang is voor onze klanten en opdrachtgevers  en voor RVO zelf  Zo creëren we meerwaarde met data en dragen we bij aan een sterk en duurzaam Nederland  De afdeling Data is op 1 september 2020 gestart als een nieuwe afdeling binnen RVO  Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland  RVO  RVO is een inclusieve werkgever die diversiteit omarmt  We maken ons hard voor gelijke kansen voor iedereen  ongeacht huidskleur  afkomst  religie  nationale afkomst  seksuele geaardheid  leeftijd  staatsburgerschap  burgerlijke staat  beperking of genderidentiteit  We streven ernaar om onze verschillen optimaal te benutten zodat we creativiteit  innovatie en talentontwikkeling kunnen stimuleren  Kansen voor Nederland  kansen voor jou  Een duurzame  economisch sterke samenleving  daar werken we aan bij de Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland  RVO   Met nationale en internationale programma s  van de energietransitie en voedselproductie tot ontwikkelingsprojecten in Afrika  Met voorlichting  advies  financiering  subsidies en hulp bij het vinden van zaken  of kennispartners  Door slim organiseren en maximaal gebruik van digitale communicatie zorgen we voor een soepele en optimale dienstverlening  Door elkaar op te zoeken en verbindingen te leggen bieden we nieuwe inzichten en mogelijkheden  Voor en achter de schermen zetten 4500 mensen zich in voor een economisch sterk  innovatief en duurzaam Nederland  op verschillende vestigingen in Nederland  Ook voor jou zijn er kansen  Onze adviseurs weten als geen ander wat er nodig is om ondernemende Nederlanders vooruit te helpen  Beoordelaars nemen subsidie  en andere verzoeken onder de loep en helpen de aanvragers om nieuwe stappen te zetten  Inkopers benutten de inkoopkracht van de Rijksoverheid  ook om maatschappelijke doelen te bereiken  De medewerkers van de frontoffice staan iedereen te woord die vragen heeft  Functioneel beheerders ontwikkelen en onderhouden digitale loketten  Projectmanagers onderzoeken wat de mogelijkheden van big data zijn  Juristen adviseren over de toepassing van wet  en regelgeving en handelen bezwaar en beroepen af binnen de ruimte die wet  en regelgeving biedt  Ook zijn ze betrokken bij het opstellen van nieuwe wet  en regelgeving  En communicatieadviseurs ontwikkelen toegankelijke websites voor voorlichting en advies  Wie ondernemend Nederland een warm hart toedraagt  kan bij onze organisatie dus alle kanten op

Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

Data Scientist Salary  Negotiable depending on experienceWe are looking for a highly motivated  organised  and insightful Data Scientist   Energy Analyst to work with us to operate and grow our business  Whilst established for many years we have in the last 6 years embarked on an aggressive growth plan which has seen us become a leading provider of energy market data  analysis  and consultancy We influence and inform investors  banks  traders and government agencies on a daily basis and we are looking to consolidate our position in our established market and grow our products and services into Continental Europe and the wider world by harnessing and developing your skills and knowledge We are looking for people who are comfortable interacting and building relationships with new and existing customers  working at all levels of an organisation  You will need to be highly numerate  to understand and help us run our business with good communication and analytical skills  to ensure we deliver valuable insight through our services Having the necessary creativity to spot opportunities and position us to take advantage of these is a key part of the role along with the focus needed to do the hard work that is required to deliver  Strong numeracy and IT skills are paramount  language skills desirable  and passion and a can do attitude are essential We anticipate that you will hold a degree in a business  engineering  science  or maths related subject but applicants with other experience who can demonstrate that they can work at the level required are welcome  Most importantly we are looking for people with drive  that are willing to grow with us We can offer hybrid working   regular weekly working from our Terneuzen office is preferred   and the opportunity to work in our UK office to integrate and interact fully with our colleagues there Please send a resume and covering letter and our recruitment team will contact you directly to confirm receipt Work 2599 Are you interested in the digital world of Agriculture  Do you want to contribute to the development of sustainable farming systems through digital   data driven solutions  Are you innovative and an enthusiastic team player  Then we would like to meet you The Challenge Agrifirm is looking for a full time  40 hour  Data Scientist who is specialized in applied data insights  As a Data Scientist you will contribute to the development and implementation of digital solutions  You will work on different levels in strong connection with the Product Owner and Research and you will also be the bridge between the product team and the data science department  You will be working in a multi disciplinary team in a network organization with limited hierarchy and plenty of room for development  Responsibilities  Responsible for defining and setup of  joint  research and implementation projects  Contributing to  joint  research and development projects  Active networking with stakeholders for knowledge gathering and development of future oriented added value concepts  Analysis of data using statistical models and methods  For example  The nutrition department wants to know whether there is a relationship between the composition of the supplied feed and the production results of the broilers  Develop and maintain mathematical models  For example  The planning department asks for a model that predicts when new feed orders have to be placed What can we find on your CV Experience in working in a business environment  In possession of an MSc Degree mathematics  econometrics or similar  You speak English fluently  About one year of experience in data handling and modelling  Experience in working with R  Python and Databricks  Experience in PowerBI is an advantage This is you You have strong communication skills  You are a team player  are enthusiastic and know how to take ownership  You have a passion for data and want to get the most out of it  Project management is something you are good at  You are market oriented and know how to make and create impact  Our offerA challenging full time job within an enthusiastic and committed team where cooperation and results come first  As a colleague at Agrifirm you will receive the following  An extensive introduction program  A good salary  Approx  36 free days  23 holidays   13 ATV based on a full time job   Laptop and an iPhone  Good secondary employment conditions  Extensive development opportunities through our Agrifirm AcademyRoyal Agrifirm The vision of Agrifirm is to work each day to a responsible food chain for future generations  If you want to contribute to this  then there is a great career ahead of you at Agrifirm  You can apply through the application button  Your questions can be aimed at Sela Ford  Corporate Recruiter on  31  0 6   13 18 49 76  An  online  assessment is part of the procedure  Acquisition in response to this vacancy will not be appreciated  CV s submitted through recruitment organisations via email  internet or directly without a valid written agreement are seen as property of Agrifirm  No costs will be paid if the candidate in question is accepted by Agrifirm    LI SF1  Why should you be interested in joining us  At Royal Agrifirm Group  we are passionate about farming  We want to make the difference  care about the future and aim high  Together we can be the best  we can create relevant impact worldwide  Join us on our journey to create a responsible food chain for future generations

systemen te gebruiken   Job summary Alle Amazon teams en  bedrijven  van Prime delivery tot AWS  worden geleid door vier belangrijke principes  klantenobsessie in plaats van focus op concurrentie  passie voor innovatie  toewijding aan operational excellence en langetermijndenken  Wij worden enthusiast van het bouwen van technologieën  het uitvinden van producten en het leveren van diensten die het leven van onze klanten veranderen   Wat Amazonians in teams en regio s verenigt  is dat we er allemaal naar streven om onze klanten te verrassen en hun leven vereenvoudigen  De reikwijdte en schaal van onze missie drijft ons om verschillende perspectieven te zoeken  vindingrijk te zijn en door onduidelijke situaties te navigeren  Het uitvinden en leveren van dingen die nooit voor mogelijk werden gehouden is niet eenvoudig  maar we omarmen deze uitdaging elke dag   Door samen te werken vóór onze klanten  bouwen we aan de toekomst  Kom je samen met ons aan de toekomst werken   Wij zijn op zoek naar Data Medewerkers die ons team in Den Haag komen versterken   We waarderen jouw aandacht voor details en flexibiliteit om je aan te kunnen passen aan veranderingen afhankelijk van de vraag van onze klanten  Jij ben pro actief en staat bekend om jouw efficientie manier van werken en nauwkeurigheid   Ben je klaar om de uitdaging aan te gaan   Wat ga jij nou doen als datamedewerker  Jij werkt met tekst  spraak en andere soorten gegevens en koppel labels aan de inhoud van verschillende teksten  Jij lever hoge kwaliteit van gelabelde gegevens  maakt gebruik van richtlijnen om te controleren van verpakkings  en etiketgegevens van producten voor distributie van de producten door Dayes  Dit is belangrijk voor het goed verlopen van de verkoopprocessen en logistieke en financiële warenhuizen in Europa  Dagelijks bedienen we onze vele klanten in voornamelijk Nederland  België  Duitsland  Frankrijk en het Verenigd Koninkrijk  Werken bij Dayes betekent werken voor een groeiend én Finance  Utrecht  Netherlands   Apply Summary  Curiosity didn t kill the cat  not on Trengo s watch  Curiosity is the biggest strength you can use as Trengo s business data analyst  you seek to understand how the business works and you ask the strategic questions that no one has asked before you   In an increasingly digital world  Trengo envisions a smooth way of connecting people with the companies behind their products and services  Our software makes it easy for customer facing teams to collaborate on conversations via multiple channels  all in one shared inbox  Email  Instagram  Facebook  WhatsApp  live chat  you name it  With an A round investment of  36M led by Insight Partners and Peak Capital  we are strengthening our position in the Netherlands and accelerating our rapid growth in Europe   When you meet anyone who works at Trengo  you ll most likely find them excited about continuous improvements  empowered to add their own touch to the world of online communication and eager to collaborate with diverse people on a daily basis   What your day looks like  Let s break down this vision into a little taste of your work at Trengo  Be part of the most cross functional team at Trengo  The Data Team  Your main focus is the go to market teams  sales  customer and business operations teams   But we all work together to provide data insights to all different teams to support and improve our business  Help us move away from information overwhelm towards data driven decisions  made with ease  Together with the rest of the Data team  you will be responsible for the Data Warehouse  connecting data sources  structuring data  data analysis and  ultimately  you make data insights available for different teams to support the business  From A to Z  you own the structure and define the deliverables of Data projects to meet the needs of your main stakeholders and other teams when needed  Get to the bottom of what makes Trengo tick  With your passion for solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches  you analyze raw data and turn it into actionable insights to help develop Trengo s strategy  Develop and maintain dashboards to support the understanding of the customer journey for your stakeholders and other business operations  What we expect  Now that you know a bit about us  can you tell us a bit about you  I hope you can identify yourself with some of these  Professional experience in a business data analyst position or similar  You are familiar with Data pipelines  Data Warehouses  Data manipulation  and Data analysis  You ve built BI dashboards before  Strong knowledge of SQL  You have worked in cross functional teams where you advised other teams on metrics  processes  and reporting with your strong communication skills  Ideally  you re still using your knowledge from your MSc in Econometrics  Applied Mathematics  Finance or the like  What we offer  his is what we carefully prepared for you  Finding yourself in a fast growing company  where your career can evolve  we re aiming to double the size of our Trengo team by the end of the year  2021 was epic and  best believe it  2022 is looking bright on our side  Join a young and energetic team with fun colleagues  Free sessions with on demand psychologists from OpenUp  Your mental health is important to us  A learning budget to feed your curiosity and 2 extra days off for your courses or conferences  if needed  For when we re back in the office  you can bet we have delicious warm lunches together  Also  your expenses for traveling to happy Utrecht will be reimbursed  Full time employment contract  40 hours week  and 25 days off per year  Apply Why Trengo For the past 5 years  Trengo has been working hard to become a major international player based in see which  future  position you prefer to fulfil  Other reasons to choose for us  Together we are creating a workplace where we can be the best version of ourselves by living our core values every About NoticeSoundNoticeSound started in 2012 because the current industry seems to focus only on successful stars  which makes it rather difficult for young talents to break through given their limited resources  financial means  and knowledge  This is why we believe there is a strong need for insights and guidance in the creation process  as well as distribution  recording  promotion  etc    combining your talent and our research to achieve success  In order to do so  we have developed software to test new and existing tracks of artists which allows us to measure the potential of tracks for different target audiences  This resulted in separate brands such as Sounders Music which is an innovative  independent company in the entertainment industry that provides unique data insights together with objective research for emerging talent  These insights and facts ensure stars  breakthroughs as we guide them along their way to success In parallel NoticeSound also provides data solutions to entertainment companies by using our technology which includes sophisticated algorithms  data providing  possibility analysis  apps  and upload portals to make predictions about the success of content Job Description You will work directly with several clients by providing diverse insights and solutions suited to their necessities  Also  you will be working with the Sounders database where you will create visually interesting and engaging high quality visualisation data designs and implementation for emerging talent in the music industry Your ResponsibilitiesBuild unique databases that will help manage data visualization engagements across several clientsRetrieve and compile data from different entertainment sources APIsBuild strategies through analyzing diverse customer behavior in different marketsDeliver actionable insight by performing analytics to measure  interpret and predict business trendsChallenging customer or project requirements to ensure they are delivering business outcomes to their clientsAbout youRelevant bachelor s degree on higher education level  computer science  math  BI  data science or an equivalent Experience as a data analyst  data scientist  data engineer or related quantitative roleYou understand Python  R and SQLComfortable with statistics  probability  and quantitative analysis methodsYou understand Machine Learning  Deep Learning and or Artificial IntelligenceIntellectual curiosity  along with excellent problem solving and quantitative skills  including the ability to disaggregate issues  identify root causes and recommend solutionsSolid English communication skills  both written and verbalWhat do we offer We offer a competitive salary based on experience and working hoursWorking from abroad or home is cool as long as you are willing to travel once in a while to Rotterdam and want to videocall in our time zone GMT  2You will be part of a small dedicated and ambitious teamWe are based in a modern office on the 26th floor  100 meters away from Rotterdam Central StationJob Types  Full time  Part timeAbility to commute relocate Rotterdam  Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work  Preferred

Introductie Ben jij op zoek naar een vervolgstap in de richting van Data   Implementatie Analist waarin leren en werken hand in hand gaan  Organisatie Het Traineeship Data   Implementatie Analist is een eenjarig traineeprogramma waarin het ontwikkelen van jouw talenten centraal staat  Je start met een basisopleiding van twee weken  Daarna krijg je wekelijks uitdagende trainingen aangeboden over design thinking  data analyse  persoonlijke drijfveren and many more  Als trainee word je onderdeel van een scrum team bij een Risk Management afdeling binnen een bank  Je werkt samen met hen aan uitdagende projecten op het snijvlak van mensen  data en processen  Na dit eenjarig programma treed je in dienst bij de bank  Omdat er een project zit aan te komen waar al wat kennis  en ervaring wordt gevraagd zoeken we op dit moment iemand die al een jaar of 2 werkervaring heeft opgedaan met data en die klaar is om zich echt inhoudelijk verder te gaan verdiepen in Data Analyse  Functie Steeds veranderende technologie  hoge klant verwachtingen en customer experience zorgen dat banken als Rabobank  ABN AMRO en ING erg innovatie gericht zijn  Risk Management speelt hier een hoofdrol in  Het zorgt er voor dat de bank gezond en bestuurbaar blijft  Het constant verbeteren van processen  het beter kunnen inschatten van risico s door middel van data analyses en machine learning en het voldoen aan de eisen die toezichthouders stellen aan krediet gerelateerde rapportages zijn dagelijkse vraagstukken  Essentieel hierbij is een evenwichtig risicomanagement  Een vakgebied waar veel vraag naar is  En dat is waar jij je als trainee in gaat onderscheiden  Als Data   Implementatie Analist bij onze opdrachtgever krijg je te maken met verschillende informatie  en analysevraagstukken  van eenvoudig tot complex  Zo houd jij je bezig met het verzamelen en ordenen van relevante data en het analyseren van huidige klantdata  Constateer je onvolkomenheden  dan los je die op  Op deze manier krijg je een steeds beter inzicht in de verschillende programma s en processen die binnen de bank worden gebruikt  Aanbod Als trainee kom je per maart of september in dienst bij New Monday en bieden wij je het volgende  Een contract van 40 uur  waarvan je 36 uur gaat werken bij een van de banken  De overige uren staan in het teken van trainingen en persoonlijke ontwikkeling  Startsalaris van  2 485   plus een kwartaalbonus  24 vakantiedagen  Reiskostenvergoeding  Een mooi salaris dat afhangt van je kennis  ervaring  Uitzicht op een uitdagende vaste baan binnen de bank waar je ingezet wordt  En natuurlijk de energie binnen dit traineeship  Fijne mensen om mee samen te werken en allemaal ambitieus  Functie eisen Jij als trainee  hebt een hbo of wo opleiding afgerond  hebt nu zo n 2 jaar werkervaring met data  wilt alles uit jezelf en je carrière halen en hebt talentontwikkeling hoog op je lijstje staan  hebt goede kennis van Excel  bent analytisch  communicatief en je werkt nauwkeurig  past je als Young Professional snel aan in verschillende situaties  hebt een goede beheersing van Nederlands en Engels

Wat je gaat doen Als Data specialist bij Arval In deze uitdagende functie maak je rapportages voor onze interne en externe klanten in zowel Nederland als Denemarken  Finland  Zweden en Noorwegen  Je vertaalt de wensen van klanten  leveranciers en directe collega s uit deze landen naar een mooi en duidelijk rapport dat de verwachtingen van de aanvrager overtreft  Hierbij is jouw kennis  ervaring en creativiteit essentieel  De vraagstukken voor de rapportages zijn zeer divers  waardoor je nieuwe kennis en ervaring opdoet over veel verschillende onderwerpen binnen de automotive   Bovendien help je mee om onze Business Intelligence tool OBI verder te ontwikkelen en uit te breiden  Hierdoor heb je ook regelmatig contact met onze IT afdeling  Daarnaast help je collega s met vragen over Excel en of Analytics verder met jouw kennis  Engels schrijven en spreken met onze collega s in de Nordics vormt geen probleem voor jou  In de startperiode geven wij jou op een enthousiaste manier de tijd en De collega s op de afdeling analyse en advies zijn nauwkeurig  nieuwsgierig en kritisch en verwachten dat jij hen hierin kunt aanvullen en versterken   Je takenpakket bestaat o a  uit  Je andere afdelingen in projecten waarbij data benodigd zijn Je ondersteunt en adviseert collega s met vragen over onze BI tool en Excel Je bouwt rapporten en dashboards in onze BI tool  Dit is waarom We zoeken developers  in opleiding  die het leuk vinden om een  vaste  ochtend  middag  avond of dag in de week volwassenen online te helpen leren programmeren als community coach  Bij de Bit Academy leiden we samen met het bedrijfsleven de programmeurs van de toekomst op  Met een sterke focus op peer to peer onderwijs  leren door te doen en autonomie behaalt een student binnen 3 jaar een volwaardig MBO diploma  De nauwe samenwerking met het bedrijfsleven zorgt ervoor dat het onderwijs up to date blijft  De studenten zijn gemotiveerd om elke dag een beetje beter te worden en hier helpen wij ze bij  Wanneer zij klaar zijn met de Bit Academy kunnen zij met vol vertrouwen een start maken aan hun carrière  Voor de Bit Academy is  een leven lang leren  een belangrijk thema  Want ook na je MBO studie moet je jezelf blijven ontwikkelen om relevant te blijven  Hierom doet de Bit Academy mee met het NL Leert Door programma  Dit is een subsidieregeling van de overheid  waarmee volwassenen gratis een opleiding  online  kunnen volgen  Wij bieden binnen deze regeling de 10 weekse opleiding junior data engineer en full stack web developer aan  waar inmiddels een groot aantal deelnemers met ontzettend veel plezier aan mee doen  Tijdens deze 10 weken heeft een deelnemer met een vaste groep elke week een online bijeenkomst van 2 uur  Door deel uit te maken van een vaste groep wordt het leren bevorderd  Daarnaast worden er door hun vaste coach inspirerende talks gehouden en vragen beantwoord  Buiten deze online bijeenkomst om kan een student altijd met vragen terecht in onze Online Learning Community  in Slack   Hier staan andere deelnemers en community coaches klaar om te helpen  Ook zijn er elke dag meerdere live coding sessies  Hierin licht de community coach bepaalde technieken verder toe in een Zoom call  De community bepaald door middel van een poll het onderwerp van deze live coding sessie  Wat ga je doen   Als community coach help je de deelnemers om betere programmeurs te worden  Programmeren leer je door te doen  dus hier ligt bij ons de focus ook op  de deelnemer moet produceren  niet consumeren  Ons lesmateriaal is zo opgebouwd dat een deelnemer er zelfstandig doorheen kan bewegen  Zit een deelnemer vast of heeft hij zij om een andere reden hulp nodig en komen ze er met mededeelnemers niet uit  Dan ben jij er als community coach om de deelnemer weer op weg te helpen  Dit kan zijn door vragen te beantwoorden in de online learning community  of even met ze te bellen via Zoom  Verantwoordelijkheden   Je bent  één van  de coach es  van een online community met meer dan 400 leden Je zorgt ervoor dat deelnemers die vastlopen verder kunnen door het beantwoorden van hun vragen Je weet ingewikkelde concepten op een simpelere manier uit te leggen Je geeft online  via Zoom  live coding sessies aan de community Je vindt het leuk om mensen te helpen leren programmeren Skills  Gedegen IT kennis  Zoals PHP  Databases  JavaScript  Object Oriented Programming  en of gedegen Data kennis  Python  SQL  Pandas  Seaborn  Jupyter Notebook  Presentaties kunnen geven Feedback kunnen geven Teamwork bevorderen Mensen kunnen stimuleren  inspireren en motiveren Wat kan je van ons verwachten   Een start training om je klaar te stomen voor het coachen Vaste trainingsmomenten om je didactische vaardigheden bij te spijkeren Een leuk enthousiast team Wekelijkse checkins om de gang van zaken te bespreken Een passende vergoeding

werkervaring op het gebied van IT en wil jij snel stappen zetten in het vak van Data   Analytics  Wil jij aan de slag als Data Professional bij Yacht en zo een bijdrage kunnen leveren aan de ambitie  en waarin je onderdeel wordt van een leuke community  Reageer dan direct op deze vacature  Als Data Consultant zorg je voor heldere antwoorden en adviseer je onze klanten bij de eerste stap naar Daarbij neem je de organisatie mee in de transitie naar een  data driven company   Als Interim Professional word je gedetacheerd bij verschillende opdrachtgevers  waardoor je in verschillende keukens regie  Het zijn trainingen zoals Python Fundamentals  Python   Panda s advanced  advanced Power BI  advanced Tableau  database design  Data architecture   governance  visualisation presenting en nog job_desc: Join us in creating software that mattersWCC has changed lives since 1996  We are a group of highly ambitious professionals who believe in the greater story  WCC is more than just a software organization  we are a community that strives for improving human life  We provide software that matters  Our product is an advanced Search and Match engine used in solutions for the private and public sector  We specialize in  ID   Security Solutions   WCC enables governments to manage large volumes of Identity and Security data  Protecting borders and citizens while providing legal identity for all Employment Solutions   WCC enables Public and Private Employment Services to match people quickly and expertly with suitable and sustainable jobs Data Matching Solutions   WCC is building the next generation of Data Matching Solutions to empower businesses to better process  manage and analyze dataWhat s in it for you Our team   Our people believe that unity is one of our strengths  So  if teamwork is important for you  we trust you will enjoy working in a team where people feel welcome  valued  and respected Work environment   We focus on talent and possibilities  not limitations  We love challenges and exploring new creative horizons  WCC has a diverse environment that gives every person the freedom to express their ideas We want to give you the conditions to do your best work  so here are the Perks and Benefits we provide  competitive salary pension plan disability insurance coverage of transportation costs Visa sponsorship and 30  ruling support  if it s the case  26 vacation days personal development opportunities Dutch training hybrid working from home   working from the office policy Home office budget An opportunity to create an international and diverse network Your role as a Data AnalystAs a Data Analyst at WCC  you work in an innovative  international environment where you are challenged to develop analytical methods that constantly improve our products  as well as to contribute to technology that truly impacts and improves the lives of people around the world  Data Science professionals play a crucial role in WCC s business processes  both in product development and in project execution  Data Engineers are challenged to pre process imperfect real world data and set up infrastructures that allow for our products to make optimal use of this data  These infrastructures also enable our Data Analysts and Data Scientists to uncover how our delivery teams can best model data  represent domain knowledge  and fine tune our products to get the most value out of our customers  data Responsibilities Collect  clean  and enrich real world data that can help bring our products bring more value to our customers  Partner with our product and delivery teams to transform raw data into valuable insights and models  for example by performing descriptive or predictive analyses to get a better understanding of emerging labor market trends  Interact with various clients within different domains to understand their data and analytics needs  and translate these needs into working proofs of concept in collaboration with other members of the Data Science team  Work with the Data Science team to support our product teams in embedding cutting edge Data Science into products that impact the lives of millions of people around the world  In order to be successful in this role  you should  Have a professional level of English  both written and verbal  Have a completed M Sc  or B Sc  degree in a quantitative field like Data Science  Artificial Intelligence  Machine Learning  Computer Science  Statistics  Mathematics  or Econometrics  Have at least 3 years of professional experience in quantitative analysis on large volumes of data  for instance by using Spark Hadoop in combination with statistics and machine learning packages like MLlib or Weka  Have experience with working in Python and libraries like pandas  numpy  scikit learn  and matplotlib  Have a deep understanding of the state of the art  strengths  and pitfalls of methods and techniques for data analysis  Be experienced in optimizing analytical methods for robustness and scalability in environments with large amounts of imperfect real world data  Have a hands on mentality combined with a strong analytical mindset  Be able to think independently and act as a team player  Bonus points for Having a good sense of humor  Being able to use your full stack development skills in  a o   Java and Angular in order to present your analyses in intuitive visualizations that effectively communicate your findings  Sounds good   Upload your motivation and resume in English and let s talk   Should you have any questions   Contact our recruiter Giulia at gionitoiu wcc group com and you will get your answer

player agents and represents foreign players that want to make a move to the Dutch national football competition  With our services we give answers to questions like  which clubs are interesting for a certain player  what value does a player represent and other data related football questions  In the first years of its existence  FACTS acquired over 50 partners in most European countries  and lately we are working with clubs for our services  Job purpose  The core of our existence is data  All our services rely heavily on data and the intelligence that we extract from it  With the data science department  it is your job to ensure that the production of our reports and other data insights is 100  available  Next to this  with the addition of new data sources from suppliers and new demands from the market our models have to be updated and upgraded  Moreover  the development of new models that enhance the quality of our product is  together with the team  part of your job  You are the backbone of our company  Tasks and Responsibilities  Manage the production of our reports Make sure our current models are up to date with the latest mathematical and football insights Address  FACTS Consultancy Arlandaweg 92 1043EX Amsterdam Netherlands CoC number  76460339 VAT number  860630791B01FACTS CONSULTANCY Design new  econometric  models that contribute to our portfolio of products Create code that enhances the efficiency and quality control of our production process Qualifications  Bachelor s degree in quantitative field Fluent in English Neat and structured work ethic Solution oriented person Experienced with Python  MySQL and Github What we offer  Fun  dedicated and young team Flexible working hours Room for your ideas and contributions A football environment to develop your data science skills

job_desc: Do you like your successes to drive our client s successes Engagement Factory  a Blend360 company  is a fast growing marketing science and data solutions company  We offer the opportunity to work in an innovative scale up culture where everything you do matters  With world class capabilities  solutions and an incredible service  Engagement Factory strives to help large EMEA B2B and B2C companies solve the puzzle of data driven business acceleration What is our team like Our international team is a balanced mix varying expertise and experience  Within our team there is plenty of room for personal ideas and personal development  A new challenge is always lingering on the horizon  What s more  Fun  We regularly do fun things together  Friday afternoon drinks  gaming nights  running a marathon or an exciting pub quiz We are looking for talented graduates who are interested in a career in Data Science and want to join our dynamic team Want to kick start your career in Data Science  Join our All Star program Engagement Factory s All Star program is a 6 month full time program with hand on training from our field experts  working directly with clients  During the All Star program you will be enhancing your technical skills and business acumen by attending various technical classes  You will also be awarded with several valuable certificates in the field of Data Science  You will also get a lot of guidance in developing your soft skills  personal leadership  project management  etc   The Data Science All Star will focus on four main areas  Analytical methodsTechnology programs and platformsData management and analysisBusiness applications and approachesThis helps you to be successful  You have a master s degree in analytics  statistics  or another quantitative field You have experience in developing code and or applications using software as Python  R and SQL You want to learn more about machine learning approaches  algorithms  libraries and processes for feature selection and engineering You want to learn more about cloud based platforms  such as Azure and AWS  If you already have experience using those platforms  this is a plus You have a great learning and teamwork attitude You are willing to work at our office in Eindhoven at least 2 3 days a week What to expect from us  A fully paid training path toward becoming a professional Data Scientist A gross monthly salary of   2 800 25 annual days of paid leave and 8  holiday allowance A guided path for personal and professional development in which you obtain valuable certificates The chance to develop yourself in an inspiring  international growth company You ll join a group of marketing  sales and data science experts that love to push boundaries  challenge each other to get the best possible results and have fun while doing that Job Types  Full time  PermanentSalary  From  2 800 00 per month

Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps  With 6 billions downloads and over 300 million monthly active users  Voodoo is the  1 mobile publisher worldwide  The company is one of the most impressive examples of hypergrowth in the ecosystem  backed by Goldman Sachs  Tencent  and GBL  Deciding to expand its portfolio of products further  Voodoo has more recently announced its investment in blockchain technology to bring blockchain games to mobile users  Voodoo is now a team of over 600 employees worldwide  we re looking for talented individuals from across the globe to come and entertain the world with us  This position can be based in Paris Team The Engineering   Data team is Voodoo s central tech hub  We build innovative tech products that allow us to stay ahead of the game in the mobile industry  Our Engineering   Data team plays a key role in Voodoo s long term strategy  It enables us to both accelerate product diversification and provide a state of the art growth engine to distribute and scale our games  We create innovative solutions that drive growth with a pragmatic approach  ranging from simple searching to complex machine learning systems  Role We are looking for a Data Business Analyst who is deeply passionate about data driven decisions  transforming raw data into clear actionable business insights  and who is constantly driving themselves and the team towards completing the next challenge  By joining this team  you will have a strong impact on the business and a unique opportunity to reach hundreds of millions of users with your insights and recommendations  Analyzing large  complex data sets representing the behavior of millions of online and mobile game players to address strategic and operational business questions Provide actionable recommendations and conclusions from game data to shape features  game economies  and future product roadmaps Work closely with internal departments to drive insights that will help produce better games and insights that will drive towards monetization and retention improvements Build automated dashboards and reports to facilitate company wide awareness and understanding of key business metrics and players  experience Manage multiple projects at a time in a fast paced  results oriented environment Profile At least one year of analytical work experience  preferably for a web or mobile company  or in the online gaming industry BA B Sc in Statistics   Math   Engineering  Economy or other quantitative fields Strong SQL with experience in querying large  complex data sets and strong Excel skills High level of analytical and problem solving skills with strong attention to detail Ability to turn complex concepts into actionable recommendations True passion for understanding consumers  social gaming behavior and tolerance for ambiguity Experience working with Periscope   Tableau is an advantage Advanced knowledge in statistical tools and models is an advantage

About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the role  We re accepting these challenges by applying data  algorithms and machine learning to problems in logistics  routes  personalization  search  pricing  experimentation and more  Our Data team is at the heart of this effort and is an essential ingredient in Beat s aggressive growth plan and vision for the future   As a Data Analyst in Pricing  you will take on some of our biggest marketplace challenges such as optimising dynamic pricing models  discovering opportunities for new product features  understanding price elasticity  or evaluating the impact of product changes on our passengers and drivers  Your work will impact the entire marketplace  so you ll have the opportunity to make an immediate difference  Your day to day will involve close collaboration with stakeholders across product  operations  machine learning  data engineering  and technology   What you ll do day in day out  Contribute to solving challenging two sided marketplace problems using data solutions  Understand user behavior with regards to pricing and help shape our pricing strategy  Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps  Design and implement frameworks to measure price elasticity of passengers at scale  Evaluate price changes in a controlled manner  either via offline or online experiments  Work together with the product and analytics teams to identify and deliver high impact product improvements and optimizations  Keep yourself updated with advances in the fields related to ride hailing and micro mobility  Work closely with other data members of the team  build a strong data driven culture in the domain and ensure that we have the right knowledge and tools to solve problems  What you need to have  Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience  At least 3 years of hands on experience in analytics in a fast paced environment  Knowledge of SQL  Python R  and data visualisation tools such as Tableau  Exemplary communication skills  ability to work with cross functional teams  including technical and non technical team members  Strong commercial awareness  ability to clarify ambiguity and balance priorities  Interest in experimentation  designing experiments  and using causal inference methods to draw conclusions  Deep belief in data and ability to rally people behind your findings recommendations  Nice to have  Experience with pricing analytics  What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

Dit ga je doen Herken jij vanuit data ontwikkelingen en verbetermogelijkheden  Heb jij oog voor het leggen van verbanden die een ander niet ziet  Als Klant Data Analist ben jij de specialist op het gebied van klant data  De analyses die jij doet en de adviezen die jij geeft  leiden tot verbeteringen die zorgen voor een optimale ervaring van de klanten van het CAK   De afdeling Klantmanagement is ervoor verantwoordelijk dat de regelingen Zvw en Buitenland werken en denken vanuit de klant en de bedoeling van de regeling  De collega s op de afdeling zorgen ervoor dat het Regelingcluster en alle medewerkers doordrongen zijn van de verschillende klantdoelgroepen  hun specifieke problemen en wensen en de optimale wijze waarop het CAK hen kan bedienen   Jij bent als Klant Data Analist een sparringpartner voor het management  Gevraagd en ongevraagd verzorg jij analyses en geef jij advies  Dit alles met een optimale ervaring voor de klant in het achterhoofd  Tevens maak jij vanuit incidenten ook grondige analyses  Specifieke activiteiten waar jij verantwoordelijk voor bent zijn o a  het verzamelen en inlezen van relevante data  het achterhalen van requirements en het opstellen van rapportages  Uiteraard bekleed je vanuit deze werkzaamheden een adviserende rol richting het management  waarbij jouw adviezen helder geformuleerd en haalbaar zijn  Belangrijk in deze functie is dat jij een goed overzicht houdt over de totale keten  zodat jij weet wat de impact is van jouw werkzaamheden  Daarnaast is proactief communiceren en afstemmen met stakeholders essentieel  Je hebt in je rol veel contact met collega Klant Data Analisten  Adviseurs Klantmanagement en jouw leidinggevende   Met jouw datagedreven manier van werken til jij de afdeling en het CAK naar een hoger niveau  Dit komt tot uiting via jouw analyses  maar is ook terug te zien in de datamodellen en dashboardondersteuning die jij levert  Uiteindelijk ervaren de klanten van het CAK deze impact  waardoor de klantbeleving sterk verbeterd wordt   Dit neem je meeminimaal HBO opleiding afgerond  je hebt meerdere jaren ervaring opgedaan in een vergelijkbare rol  je bent zowel sterk in data analyse als in functionele analyse  uiteraard ben jij sterk analytisch onderlegd  waarbij jij jouw analyses ook graag omzet naar concrete resultaten  je bent assertief  oplossingsgericht en communicatief vaardig  je werkt altijd met een goed eindresultaat in het achterhoofd  je hebt ervaring met Business intelligence tools dataverwerkingsprogramma s zoals bv  PowerBI  SQL en Oracle  je schrikt niet van grote en complexe datastromen   Dat je wilt blijven leren en een baan zoekt voor de lange termijn is belangrijk voor het CAK  Wij investeren graag in jouw ontwikkeling zodat jij blijvend kunt groeien  Werken bij het CAK vraagt energie  doorzettingsvermogen en daadkracht   Dit krijg je van onseen salaris van minimaal   2 906   en maximaal   4 277   bruto per maand  schaal 9 CAO Zorgverzekeraars  bij een 36 urige werkweek  inschaling o b v  opleiding  kennis en relevante ervaring  een functie voor de lange termijn met na een jaar kans op een vast contract  24 5 vakantiedagen o b v  36 urige werkweek  een keuzebudget van 16 33  van je bruto salaris  een goede pensioenvoorziening  ondergebracht bij ABP  een collectieve zorgverzekering en sportmogelijkheden  waar het CAK in kan bijdragen  openbaar vervoer wordt volledig vergoed  2e klasse   Of  0 19 kilometervergoeding wanneer je met de auto komt tot max 75km enkele reis  We gebruiken hiervoor Mobility Mixx  ruimte voor jouw loopbaan en persoonlijke ontwikkeling  Onder andere met een online CAK academie en samenwerkingsverbanden met trainingsbureaus  de mogelijkheid om thuis en op ons kantoor in Den Haag te werken  Vanwege de huidige Covid 19 omstandigheden werken wij voorlopig vanuit huis  Hiervoor ontvang je een thuiswerkvergoeding van twee euro per dag   Wist je dat ruim 1 5 miljoen Nederlanders te maken hebben met het CAK  Het CAK is een belangrijke maatschappelijke speler in het zorgdomein  We voeren regelingen uit in opdracht van het ministerie van Volksgezondheid  Welzijn en Sport  VWS  én vertalen de wet  en regelgeving naar begrijpelijke en toegankelijke informatie voor onze klanten  Dit doen we samen met gedreven specialisten die geloven in verbondenheid  Die  binnen een cultuur van continu leren en verbeteren  elke dag het verschil willen maken voor onze klanten  Want dat is werken bij het CAK  werken met de menselijke maat   Klaar voor een nieuwe uitdaging bij het CAK  Je kunt direct solliciteren via onderstaande button  Heb je nog vragen  Neem dan contact op met recruiter Joost van der Wende via 06 41570568 of jwende hetcak nl   Meer weten over wat je kunt verwachten als je hebt gesolliciteerd  Ontdek hier alles over ons sollicitatietraject   Iedereen is anders en juist de verschillen in mensen helpen ons om een nog beter CAK te zijn  Voel je daarom altijd welkom te solliciteren  wij zijn benieuwd naar wie JIJ bent  Deze vacature staat gelijktijdig intern en extern uit  Sollicitaties van herplaatsings  en VWNW kandidaten worden met voorrang behandeld  Bij gelijke geschiktheid hebben interne medewerkers van het CAK voorrang in de procedure  Een Pre Employment Screening  PES  is onderdeel van de sollicitatieprocedure   Over het CAK Het CAK biedt jou uitdagend werk met maatschappelijke meerwaarde  Samen met collega s vorm jij de belangrijkste factor om de omschakeling naar publieke dienstverlener met de menselijke maat te doen slagen  Bij het CAK werk je in een resultaat  én klantgerichte omgeving met een cultuur van continu leren en verbeteren met oog voor jouw vakmanschap

job_title: Control Tower Data Analist (fulltime) | Lochem | Vacature
job_desc: Een sterke  communicatief vaardige en gedreven persoonlijkheid met een passie voor cijfers en het talent om complexe data te vertalen naar treffende rapportages  Kun jij vervolgens ook een zodanige analyse leveren dat onze Operations organisatie de juiste acties in gang kan zetten ter verbetering van de performance  Dan komen we graag met jou in contact  Wat ga je doen  Je gaat werken binnen de Control Tower  Dit team is centraal gepositioneerd in de Operations organisatie waar data informatie over Productie en Logistiek beschikbaar komt die managers in staat stelt om te sturen op de KPI s  Samen met je team zorg je ervoor dat rapportages en analyses van data uit verschillende informatiesystemen correct worden opgesteld en aangeleverd  Je rapporteert in deze functie aan de Operational Excellence manager  Het CT team is in ontwikkeling en je krijgt alle ruimte om hier mede vorm aan te geven en bij te dragen aan het succes van het team  Wat zijn je belangrijkste werkzaamheden als Control Tower Data Analist  Je analyseert data en stelt rapportages en dashboards op voor Productie en Logistiek  Je optimaliseert de processen zoals allocatie  salesprognoses  klachtenanalyse  materiaal flow  Je signaleert trends in je analyses en vertaalt deze door naar de business  Je denkt proactief mee en initieert en implementeert verbetervoorstellen  Je denkt mee bij de ontwikkeling van een statisch datasysteem naar een dynamische variant  Je bent het aanspreekpunt voor bedrijfsleiders en logistiek managers voor wat betreft hun informatiebehoeften  Wat wij van jou verwachten  Je hebt een afgeronde hbo opleiding  bij voorkeur een specialisatie procesoptimalisering of datamanagement richting de supply chain  Je beschikt over relevante werkervaring  Je hebt kennis van relevante ERP systemen  Microsoft Office  Access  Excel   bij voorkeur SAP  Power BI  Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal  Wat je van ForFarmers krijgt Je werkt bij de marktleider in de Europese diervoedersector  Mogelijkheid tot thuiswerken  je ontvangt een aanvullende thuiswerkvergoeding  Je krijgt 24 vakantiedagen en 13 adv dagen op basis van fulltime dienstverband  Jaarlijks ontvang je 8  vakantiegeld en een eindejaarsuitkering van 4   Laptop  iPhone en reiskostenvergoeding  Veel ruimte voor je eigen inbreng en ideeën om het werken bij ForFarmers nog interessanter te maken  Wil jij je blijven ontwikkelen  Dat kan via de ForFarmers Academy  Wie ben jij  Een teamspeler met een sterk analytisch denkvermogen die makkelijk de verbinding maakt en mensen in beweging brengt  Je bent een kei in het signaleren van trends en weet mensen hierop aan te haken en samen actie te nemen  Daarnaast blijf jij altijd scherp op wat er beter kan  Zin om je schouders eronder te zetten en onze Control Tower Data Analist te worden  Reageer direct  Solliciteer via de solliciteer button bovenaan deze pagina  Je wordt automatisch doorgelinkt naar onze sollicitatiemodule  Vul deze in en voeg je motivatie en cv als bijlage toe  Je sollicitatie wordt uiteraard vertrouwelijk behandeld  Heb je vragen  Neem contact op met Koen Bouts  Operational Excellence manager  via ons centrale telefoonnummer  0573 28 88 00

Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

Als Data Analist werk je samen met het team indirect aan een optimale gastbeleving bij het grootste horeca familiebedrijf van Nederland  Een mooie manier om jezelf te ontwikkelen bij een familiebedrijf dat iedereen kent  Werken bij Van der Valk betekent werken vol toewijding en elke dag het beste uit jezelf halen  Ondernemen zit in ons DNA en mede daardoor blijven we groeien  Je maakt deel uit van het datateam van Van der Valk International en werkt nauw samen met onze collega s in Duitsland  Jouw standplaats is dan ook Tiel maar je reist regelmatig af naar onze locatie Moers in Duistland  Data Analist Als Data Analist is er bij Van der Valk meer mogelijk dan je denkt  Tijdens je inwerkperiode doorloop je alle facetten van jouw afdeling  Je grijpt je kans om jouw passie voor data  nieuwe technologieën en het ontwerp en de ontwikkeling van nieuwe data gedreven oplossing tot uiting te laten komen  Dagelijks haal jij het beste uit jezelf en je collega s  Na de inwerkperiode kun je de dagelijkse werkzaamheden die bij de functie horen zelfstandig uitvoeren  Je weet daarnaast als geen ander wat gastvrijheid is en kunt dit goed overbrengen op alle collega s  Bij ons luidt de slogan namelijk   wij zeggen geen nee  maar bieden een alternatief   In de rol van Data Analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor de voorbereiding en consolidatie van gegevens uit interne en externe gegevensbronnen en voor de datavisualisatie met Power BI  Je rapporteert aan de Senior Data Analist en stakeholders  Je werkt nauw samen met het management en andere afdelingen en hebt hierbij de focus op onze Duitse organisatie  Je verliest hierbij de doelstellingen nooit uit het oog  En  Je verzamelt informatie  en rapportagebehoeften van interne stakeholders  met focus op onze Duitse This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays   We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos  and Spotify Data Scientist  Adyen is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team in Amsterdam  to jump into any problem and analyse  forecast  detect patterns and draw insights by leveraging data science algorithms and the big data platform  and thus enable teams to go beyond   You will be responsible for building and interpreting algorithms that power data products at Adyen  In this role  you will  Obtain insights by leveraging machine learning algorithms  Examples are  Anti Money Laundering  AML  systems  Real time anomaly detection based on time series modeling  On line learning algorithms to pick the best optimization decision in a changing environment  Clustering algorithms to group customers shoppers  Supervised and semi supervised learning methods for inference on risk patterns Graph analysis and representation learning for behavior prediction and monitoring  Develop orchestrated pipelines for analytical purposes and machine learning training  Iterate with merchants and product audiences creating algorithms that power state of the art machine learning based solutions  and be able to explain the reasons behind the executed inference  Setup and run experiments to validate hypotheses  Stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the machine learning field  and apply this where applicable  Who you are You have experience developing  training  validating  benchmarking and monitoring machine learning algorithms  You have experience leveraging a big data framework to create the pipelines needed to feed the models with appropriate data  You approach problems with a statistical mindset  keeping inference as a product of data science  Experience with statistical testing  confidence  p value  A B testing  Bayesian  is a plus  You can communicate complex outcomes with clarity over a wide range of audiences  Technologies  Extensive knowledge of data science and statistics techniques  toolsets and algorithms  such as e g  Spark  Scikit Learn  TensorFlow  PyTorch  XGBoost  Pandas  Airflow  SQL Mentality  An experimental mindset with a launch fast and iterate mentality  A strong statistics mathematics background is a plus Data Positions at Adyen  We know companies handle different definitions for their data related positions  this is for instance dependent on the size of a company  Since the birth of the Data Solution and the growth of all data streams  we categorized and defined all our positions  Have a look at this blogpost to find out  Our Diversity  Equity and Inclusion commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen  Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What s next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 3 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility   Please  note that this role is a full time position in Amsterdam  It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands

While some people still think Data Analysts are noise canceling headphone wearers  crunching numbers alone in a dark room  drinking cup after cup of coffee  you know better  We know better  It s a customer service role  Customer data is important to us  and it contributes to our success which is why we re looking for a Customer Operations Data Analyst to increase our customer satisfaction We need someone like you to dive into our extensive data and gain insights into why customers renew or cancel their contracts  You will identify solutions on how our support and consulting team can optimize their work As Zivver grows internationally  we re building stronger teams and our data analysts who used to work as one centrally managed data team are now placed into business  This means that you will be actively contributing to teams  and feeling the impact of your support work immediately Another plus  according to your new colleague Saskia  is this new way of working provides you with the opportunity to envision your job   Together with the team leads and your colleagues  you will shape your dream job  while having great fun   Hot takes When it comes to data analysis  you ExcelData levels all argumentsThis makes you grinThe privacy of our customers is non negotiable A day at Zivver You couldn t be happier working at the office again  We re reopening for two days a week now and this allows you to meet and talk to real people again  You kick off with a coffee   the Monday take off  our weekly office stand up  where you get an update on all the company s ins and outs  Next up  the whole support team has an office day today and you join them for a presentation  You know support has been extremely busy these days and can hardly keep up with tickets  You did your math and  based on data  you figured out that a large part of the tickets are about how to set up a branded guest environment  you suggest we could quickly solve this time consuming task with an extra FAQ addition  Your colleagues are very happy to hear about the predicted outcomes and will contribute to the content asap  While you re at it  you grab a coffee with Ronald and Thijs and retrieve some extra information about the needs from our bigger customers for benchmark information 1 o clock already  Lunchtime  After a well deserved break  you blocked off a substantial chunk of time to work on a Looker dashboard that will give Customer Success Managers insights into renewal numbers  You end the day with a 1 1 with Oussama  our VP of the consulting delivery team  and together you scope the initiative for more utilization and profitability insights  Responsibilities Report on past results and forecasts through dashboards and presentations  analyze available data to identify root barriers or success enablers for hitting required targets on retention  implementations  and supportReport and analyze KPI s for implementations  identify and raise awareness of improvement and determine the right solutionsDevelop custom reporting for key customersCreate and edit Looker dashboardsSet up and maintain systems to support predictive analytics of future performance that allow management to adjust strategies and tacticsWork with Marketing and Sales teams to ensure alignment of data and reporting across the whole of revenue operationsSet up mailings and mailing lists for communication with our customers as a backup for our Operations Analyst Benefits An exciting  fast growing  energetic environmentInternational diverse team with over 27 nationalities   and yes  we offer Dutch classes too HQ in Amsterdam where you re able to work a few days a week   full home office support to make sure you re all setWorking from Bali  the US or Spain  Any place  anywhere  we fully support temporary working from XAt least  1 000   per year on personal development budgetAll the relocation benefits you need for a fresh startDon t worry about tomorrow  we ve got you covered with a pension planExperience in a similar Data Analyst role Strong Analytical skills to help collect  measure  organize and analyze dataProblem solving skills   you re very accurateTeam working skillsProud of successes  peeved by mistakes  resilient to recover and learnStraight forward  direct  but always respectful with a big smileJob Type  Full time

job_title: Sr Analyst/Consultant, Real World Data Solutions
job_desc: At Certara  we accelerate medicines to patients by partnering with life science innovators  In the past 6 years  over 90  of companies that received new drug approvals by the FDA used our software or services  Our integrated and proprietary end to end platform with biosimulation  regulatory science  and market access solutions combined with our strong team of scientists and subject matter experts enable our clients to have  informed decision making   reduced clinical trial burden higher R D productivity improved patient outcomes   increased patient access to medicines accelerated regulatory approval Certara is a global team that fosters and nurtures a diverse and inclusive culture  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer  The collective sum of our individual differences  life experiences  knowledge  innovation  self expression  and unique capabilities and talent represents a significant part of our culture  our reputation and our achievement  Together with our partners  we use biosimulation and technology enabled services to transform drug discovery and development across all therapeutic areas and innovative therapies  Job Overview  This is a great opportunity for an early career Epidemiologist Pharmaco Epidemiologist Public Health professional to join a team of highly skilled epidemiologists  statisticians  health economists and consultants  The successful candidate will work closely with other senior scientific staff within the company  This position will allow the Senior Analyst  Epidemiologist to deepen his her skills by writing protocols for observational studies using a variety of healthcare databases  primary and secondary data collection  as well as providing scientific and other technical input during conception  conduct and delivery of various research projects  Main tasks   responsibilities Support RWDS project teams and be accountable to the project manager director for those projects Summarize and synthesize a wide range of medical and statistical information  including disease specific and pharmaceutical product research Develop an understanding of Regulatory HTA requirements for RWE  at least in the European and or North American context Support development of study documents  eg  protocols  analysis plans  reports  posters  manuscripts  under guidance from scientific team members and project manager s Liaise and manage processes with ethics committees  application committees and other relevant stakeholders to support acquisition of data for studies Interpret and communicate the results of clinical observational studies  health economic models  cost effectiveness and budget impact  and statistical analyses Undertake primary and secondary research initiatives including the retrieval and analysis of data  competitive product pipeline information  epidemiology trends  etc  according to needs of the project Participates in production of reports  presentations and publications  Critically analyzes data  presents results and provides internal data analysis  both qualitative and quantitative  and provides strategic thinking with respect to interpretation of results Interact with and foster relationships with existing network of scientific clinical payer experts and data providers Liaise with other consultants assigned to the project to ensure quality delivery of the project Support senior personnel with activities required for business development from time to time Align with and work within the framework of SOPs for data governance with respect to projects led Required Qualifications   Experience Minimum of Master s Degree in Epidemiology  Public Health  Medicine or other related field At least 2 years relevant post graduate work experience preferred Required Skills Professional proficiency in English  written and spoken Experience designing writing protocol for database or other observational studies Ability to work both independently and as part of the team Ability to effectively prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects OTHER INFORMATION  This position can be office based or work from home in the UK  EU  Canada or USA  Number of Employees Supervised  None Percentage of Travel Required  0 10  travel Certara bases all employment related decision on merit  taking into consideration qualifications  skills  achievement  and performance  We treat all applicants and employees without regard to personal characteristics such as race  color  ethnicity  religion  sex  sexual orientation  age  nationality  marital status  pregnancy  physical or mental condition  genetic information  military service  or other characteristic protected by law   LI HM  LI Remote 2199

Vattenfall is one of Europe s largest electricity generators and producer of heat and operates in Sweden  Denmark  Germany  the Netherlands and the UK  Our strategy is to Power Climate Smarter Living with an ambition to enable fossil free living within one generation  We are now looking for the right person to fill the position as Data Scientist   Grid Flexibility Services  within Business Area Wind  Offshore  Engineering  The Engineering department is the technical know how centre within Business Area Wind  setting the standards and guidelines as well as being embedded within our projects  both through the development and implementation phase as well as in operations  Working within Digital Integration  part of Systems Engineering  in the Analytics team  the Data Scientist is to develop analytics models to support the operations and enable data driven decision making  Main tasks   responsibilities  As part of the Analytics Team you will work on development of our analytics capabilities  processes and tools enabling data driven business decisions  Your primarily role will be to support development of our grid service products for offshore wind assets optimising the business case for different markets  Your contribution to the team will be to develop the technical and financial model that shows how the solution will work for a specific wind farm in a specific geographical market   You will collaborate closely with the other Engineers in Engineering to ensure that the analytics developed is done with the best application of domain knowledge  You support in instilling an innovative and entrepreneurial environment while balancing the risk associated Work on assigned analytics products and features primarily for Grid Flexibility services  This includes developing the backend of flexibility services engine  responsible for controlling the test and release versions of the engine  responsible for interface and code consistency  Support the process   tools maturation and application in the business  Engage in complex and high priority assignments in product development  project delivery or operational assets  Produce and review key technology documents  Identifying development opportunities including business impact  Your Profile as Data Scientist   Grid Flexibility Services may include  You have experience with Python  Other programming languages will be a plus  You have experience with CI CD pipelines You have the ability to look at developments from both technical and financial perspective  You command English in both verbal and written form  You are used to work in multi disciplinary teams  and you enjoy explaining technical solutions also to people outside your own area of expertise  You have proven skills in dealing with problems and challenges and can transfer technical and or project challenges into solutions  Location The location of this position is in one of our offices in Hamburg  Kolding or Amsterdam  Some travel is to be expected  Process and timeline We welcome your application in English  including CV and cover letter via the application button at this page  Last day to apply will be April 5  2022  and the interview process starts as soon as the applications are received  For more information about the position  you are welcome to contact Manager of Data Analytics in BA Wind  Adel Haghani   49 1621 655070  For more information about the recruitment process  you are welcome to contact our Recruiter Anica Zerfuss  49 40 790220 2141   Our organisation Energy is our contribution to quality of life   day after day  With around 20 000 colleagues Vattenfall provides comprehensive electricity and heating offerings to several million customers in northern Europe  For the work ahead we need people who are fully dedicated to our customers and to a sustainable society   people like you   Business Area Wind is responsible for Vattenfall s Onshore and Offshore Wind as well as other non hydro Renewable activities like solar PV and batteries  Today we develop  construct and operate wind generation in Sweden  Denmark  Germany  the Netherlands and the UK  In addition  we have a clear strategy to develop our solar PV and battery operations further   At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity  Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender  ethnicity  age  transgender identity or expression  religion or other belief  disability or sexual orientation
