job_desc: The opportunity Amazing Data Analyst   Team Data Analytics ING Collections NL   Will you help us improve our services for customers in financial difficulties through the smart use of data  Do you want to contribute to reducing the debt problem in the Netherlands  Are you passionate about making impact  based on data driven insights  Do you enjoy solving problems and do you also want to have an impact on society by doing so  Then we are looking for you  You  as an amazing Data Analyst  will help us realize our ambition of being mobile first  frictionless  relevant and strive to prevent debt a data driven way  This and more can be achieved whilst working in multi disciplinary teams consisting of customer journey experts  other data analysts  data scientists and our operational colleagues  What do we stand for within Collections  Collections NL wants to make a difference by being the partner of customers in financial difficulties  We offer our customers  personal  easy  smart  and customer centric solutions with the help of advanced analytics  By doing so we want to prevent customers from getting into financial hardship  prevention  and to help those with ING product related debts in a sustainable fashion  Even when it comes to debt recovery  more and more customers want to be able to handle everything independently and digitally  while looking for personal and relevant advice when it comes to complex financial issues or problems  Therefore we are improving our customer journeys on a daily basis in order to better serve our customers and more effectively  By doing so we contribute to a sustainable financially fit Netherlands  What does Collections do  Not to sound cliché  but  no day is the same at the innovative Collections department as can be illustrated by some of the topics we are currently working on  Developing a chatbot call bot Analyzing call reasons to better route customers  with the aid of Speech Analytics Segmentation and probability to default models with custom customer journeys Predictive models to be able to detect debt and possibly nudge preventively Digitization initiatives to improve the customer experience within self service Data driven approach in measuring the effectiveness all used tools for debt recovery Collaborations with the AFM  Nederlandse Schuldhulproute and also other ING countries acting on our social responsibility as an institution  striving for sustainable debt prevention and recovery The team We are 5 data analysts who have a crucial and decisive role within the tribe  where we are responsible for maximizing the impact of Collections based on data driven decisions and proactive analyses and advice  Think about analyses such as the efficiency of debt collection within NL compared to other countries  what we can learn from others  What tools or measures can we use to get and keep customers out of arrears  Feel free to reach out for more info on the team  Roles and responsibilities You know that success is a team effort You have an ambitious pro active and positive mentality You generate  analyze and present relevant customer insights and enable personal and relevant customer interactions through smart data analysis Standard reports are entrusted to our data warehouse team who made our data mart  They also build the reports in Cognos  so you can primarily focus on analysis  Your competencies A master s degree in the field of analytics  mathematics  econometrics or other analytical studies Bridgebuilder  understand data and translate the insights into actions for your stakeholders   2 4 years of demonstrable experience with data analysis via e g  SQL  SAS  Excel  Cognos  R  Python You like to participate in fun activities with the team and department    You like to continuously develop yourself You take initiative but you value cooperation just as much How to succeed We hire smart people like you for your potential  Our biggest expectation is that you ll stay curious  Keep learning  Take on responsibility  In return  we ll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself  Rewards   benefits We want to make sure that it s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life  You can find out more about our employment conditions at https   www ing jobs netherlands Why ING benefits htm The benefits of working with us at ING include A salary tailored to your qualities and experience24 27 vacation days depending on contractPension scheme13th month salaryIndividual Savings Contribution  BIS   3 5  of your gross annual salary8  Holiday paymentPersonal growth and challenging work with endless possibilitiesAn informal working environment with innovative colleaguesWork Agile  so new ideas come to life faster Interested  Please upload your CV and motivation letter by clicking the  Apply  button  About us With 57 000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries  there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business  Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what s possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer s interests at heart  Do you want to be surrounded by progressive  inspiring  diverse and supportive colleagues  Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING  Join us  Apply today

skills: marketing, excel, accounting, python, sql, r
job_desc: About Apeiron Insight Apeiron Insight is a data driven research   analytics company  providing insights   data products to investment companies for them to make better informed  investment  decisions  The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise  We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling   Machine Learning  Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines  Your role at Apeiron Insight We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors  You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research  The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models  perform data analysis  write reports  update marketing materials  and service client requests  The individual should be proficient with Excel  mathematical modeling  and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting  Experience with Python  SQL  or R is highly preferred  The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator  Additionally  the candidate must be self motivated  detail oriented  and a creative thinker who has interest   curiosity in the intersection of  alternative data   investment research  and financial markets  Responsibilities Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector  Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights  Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources  including  but not limited to  proprietary datasets  company documents and materials  SEC regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks  industry publications  and online data services  Write  edit  and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models  Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy  Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests  Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases  What are we looking for  Functional understanding of data analysis using Python  SQL or R is a must  Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners  Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business industry trends based on use of alternative data  Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data  Self starter who works well in a fast paced environment  Team player  happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering   the Management team  You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English  verbally and in writing   Command of the Dutch language is a plus  Enjoy working in a cool   stylish office  overlooking the Hague  with excellent facilities  We also really appreciate  Strong mathematical and statistical background  An intuitive understanding of business problems  What to expect  We believe in commitment  your permanent contract will be waiting for you  Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities   experience  Bonus scheme  8  holiday payment  25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week  Personal education study budget  An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best  Based in Rijswijk  of course in  hybrid mode   working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work  If you think this position fits you well  we sincerely hope to hear from you  If so  please submit your resume and motivation letter

The Role Where you fit in Shell Trading integrates a worldwide trading network with an unsurpassed global portfolio in crude oil  refined products  natural gas  electrical power  and chemicals  It has larger locations in London  Houston  Calgary  Singapore  Dubai  Rotterdam  and Barbados  Shell Trading is one of the world s largest energy traders and is a key segment of the Shell portfolio  Shell Energy Europe  SE EE  sells and actively trades energy related products and services associated with European natural gas  power  and environmental products  SE EE was created in 2009 through the combination of Shell s marketing and trading companies in Europe  SE EE is part of Shell Energy which is the commercial heart of the Integrated Gas Business and aligns all Energy Trading activity throughout the world  As part of the SE EE and NEs growth strategy  Power and Gas wholesale and customer activities are scaling significantly in existing and expanding into new market areas and deal types  This involves a significant amount of work on selecting  integrating  and maintaining new systems and processes  Shell Energy Europe Ltd   SE EE  acts as the Balancing Responsible Party  BRP  for renewable assets operated across Europe  This involves consolidating for varying local markets long and short positions to net off imbalance positions  minimise value leakage  and maximise value creation opportunity against the system price  Data is critically important in this process to inform optimisation of forecasts and to predict system buyout price  Different markets have different regulatory regimes related to the balancing market and a deep understanding of each market is critical to ensure continued license to operate for SE EE  and maximising value for the end to end business  This role in SE EE will be based in The Netherlands which means that this role will officially be part of Shell Nederland BV  What s the role  The primary accountabilities of the Renewable Data Analyst  Power  are  Work in a team of multiple Data Analysts to validate and correct data to support business critical processes  Keep track of Shell Energy Europe Ltd  s Portfolio in SE EE s data management solution for NL BRP  Collect  process  and analyse operational data  including allocation  reconciliation  and measurement data  in order to report to internal and external stakeholders  Troubleshoot issues with internal and external counterparties  including Dutch Grid Operators  Anomalies in generation and consumption patterns investigated and understood  Actively manage relationships with internal and external stakeholders  including relevant market organizations  Facilitate necessary management approvals  Work to standardise  and automate as many of these processes as possible in conjunction with IT  Understand the deal funnel to assess and manage the workload associated with integrating new opportunities into relevant systems Deep understanding of balancing regimes in country  well connected with regulatory bodies  able to understand upcoming regulatory changes and able to coordinate teams to implement system and process changes ahead of new introduction of new and or changed rules  What we need from you  The successful candidate would be required to  Be inspired by and committed to the success of Shell in the Energy Transition  Be comfortable with big  complex data sets  analysis  and application of that data to drive business value  Can process large data sets through building own queries to support resolve complex issues and support decision making  Show a keen interest in IT digitalization and other technology advancements and how these can be applied to drive competitive advantage in Shell  Understand the end to end Life of a Deal process in SE EE  Excellent customer service attention manner  Ability to scope and manage changes to IT projects and drive process improvements  Have experience in regulatory reporting frameworks for Power in Europe  demonstrating an interest in balancing regimes  Develop business relationships with customers and IT vendors  Operate effectively as part of a team as well as autonomously  Adapt quickly to a dynamic environment and demonstrate resilience under pressure  The successful candidate should also possess the following skills  Very strong interpersonal and communication skills  fluent in spoken and written Dutch and English   Excellent stakeholder engagement  Highly analytical  data driven with strong attention to detail  Process Improvement mindset  A basic knowledge of Trading and Supply European Power Operations  Trade Finance and Controls  European Regulatory Reporting and Compliance  COMPANY DESCRIPTION Shell Nederland BV is a platform for international collaboration  with Shell offering direct employment to around ten thousand people in the Netherlands alone  including roughly 2 800 non Dutch employees from around 80 countries  Diversity is key at Shell Nederland  and our employees reflect the innovation that stems from a diverse workforce  By joining Shell Nederland  you will benefit from an unrivalled industry leading development programme that will see you tap into a pool of expert knowledge that will help propel your career  Shell Nederland is the holding company of most Shell companies operating in the Netherlands  Shell Nederland also has an advisory and coordinating role in numerous areas  An innovative place to work There s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell  Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today  bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet  whilst managing the risks of climate change  Join us and you ll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future   whether by investing in renewables  exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently  An inclusive place to work To power progress together  we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard  Here are just some of the ways we re nurturing an inclusive environment   one where you can express your ideas  extend your skills and reach your potential  We re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process  workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles  Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply  and we ll take it from there  We re closing the gender gap   whether that s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology  We re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace  promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity  We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance  We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application  A rewarding place to work Combine our creative  collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice  We re huge advocates for career development  We ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings  By pushing people to reach their potential  we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had  or make career moves they never thought possible  Disclaimer Please note  We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time  including prior to the advertised closing date  Before applying  you are advised to read our data protection policy  This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal Dutch Shell Group companies around the world  The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell  Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand  Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer

job_desc: Als Data Analytics specialist ben je namens PanCompany werkzaam in vernieuwende projecten voor onze TOP 200 klanten in Nederland  Wat ga je doen  Je werkt binnen data gedreven organisaties waarbij je technologie op een slimme en ondersteunende manier in zet om waardevolle informatie uit data te halen  Je vervult binnen deze complexe data warehouse en analytics omgevingen rollen als Informatie   Data Analist  Business Intelligence specialist of Data Engineer  Daarnaast begrijp je de waarde van data en ben je in staat om functionele eisen te vertalen naar praktische en schaalbare oplossingen  Je bent inzetbaar aan zowel de backend  data warehousing   ETL  als aan de frontend  reporting   analytics  en bent ook bekend met concepten zoals data modellering  data governance en data privacy   We bieden  Afwisseling en de mogelijkheid tot bijleren in technologisch complexe en vernieuwende projecten Veel ruimte voor vakinhoudelijke ontwikkeling door externe en in house trainingen en het bezoeken van congressen De mogelijkheid om bij te dragen aan de ontwikkeling van onze Data Analytics competence Een informele werksfeer met ruime keuzevrijheid en veel evenementen  ook met partners en of gezinnen  bijv  Soldaat van Oranje  Disneyland Parijs  zweefvliegen  Movieworld Bottrop  RIB varen op de Maas  indoor skydiven  kookworkshops  etc   Een vast dienstverband met uitstekende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  waaronder een royale leaseregeling Een modern beloningsmodel  waarin je meedeelt in de omzet  gemiddeld inkomen voor mediors tussen 55 000 en 65 000 euro  voor seniors tussen 65 000 en 90 000 euro  Je profiel  Relevant hbo   wo diploma  bij voorkeur richting Business IT   Management  of vergelijkbaar  Kennis van en minimaal 5 jaar ervaring met de Microsoft BI stack  bij voorkeur aanvullend ervaring met Informatica Powercenter Ruime ervaring met BI concepten  data warehousing  reporting  analytics  Ruime kennis van databases en databaseprincipes  MS SQL Server  Teradata  Oracle   ruime ervaring met ETL en het werken met grote datasets Ervaring met data modelleringstechnieken  zoals dimensionaal modelleren of Data Vault Bij voorkeur heb je ook al ervaring met cloud oplossingen  Microsoft Azure  en de verwerking van big data  Hadoop   Spark  Zijn dit jouw kwaliteiten  Analytisch sterk  accuraat en zelfstandig in staat om in data gedreven organisaties te werken Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift Passie voor je vak en interesse in de ontwikkelingen op data gebied  Waarom kiezen voor PanCompany  PanCompany is een succesvol en snelgroeiend bedrijf  dat gespecialiseerd is in het leveren van diensten op het gebied van Software Development  Test Engineering  Agile Management en Data Analytics  Wij verlenen onze diensten voor aantrekkelijke opdrachtgevers en doen dat met louter ervaren IT experts  Onze experts hebben allemaal gekozen voor onze Expert solution  Een moderne vorm van dienstverband  waarin ondernemerschap  vakmanschap en plezier de kernwoorden zijn  Interesse  Voldoe je in jouw ogen aan het gevraagde profiel en ben je geïnteresseerd geraakt in deze vacature en onze organisatie

Wil je graag werken in een team dat voortdurend aan het innoveren is  Vind je het belangrijk dat een werkgever jou doorgroeimogelijkheden biedt  Goed dat je dit leest  bij Broekhuis Automatisering zoeken wij namelijk een Data Analist Data is voor ons van groot belang voor het sturen van onze organisatie en voor het leren kennen van onze klanten  In jouw functie help je om onze visie op data te realiseren Wat jij voor ons doet Als Data Analist ben je er om samen met je collega s van de afdeling Data   Reporting de verschillende databronnen in ons Datawarehouse beschikbaar te stellen  Je zorgt er voor dat de data uit al onze systemen op één plek samenkomt  Ons Datawarehouse in volop in ontwikkeling  je denkt mee over het ontwikkelen en beheren hiervan  In samenwerking met de business bepaal je hoe de data geïnterpreteerd en weergegeven moet worden  Je werkt in teamverband waarbij kennisdeling erg belangrijk is  Als Data Analist ben je de brug tussen onze databronnen en de business  Dit doe je door   Ervoor te zorgen dat databronnen op een juiste manier worden ontsloten  beschikbaar worden gesteld én de kwaliteit worden bewaakt  Rekening te houden met de wensen van de gebruikers  zodat de data in de juiste vorm op de juiste plaats beschikbaar is  Het processen binnen Broekhuis te doorgronden om zo tot de juiste duiding van de data te komen  Samen met het team te zorgen dat middels verschillende visualisatie en presentatie tools de informatie voorziening binnen Broekhuis verzorgt wordt   Waarom bij Broekhuis werken leuk is  Dat je bij Broekhuis ruim 1 800 collega s hebt  betekent niet dat je bij ons een nummer bent  Integendeel  Bij Broekhuis draait alles om de kracht van het team op de vestiging of ondersteunende afdelingen  Je hebt de kans om deel uit te maken van ons Automatisering team die bestaat uit 35 enthousiaste en behulpzame collega s  Het is voor ons een sport om van onze klanten ambassadeurs te maken  Bovendien is het voor Broekhuis belangrijk dat de mens centraal staat  Dat geldt niet alleen voor onze klanten maar ook voor onze medewerkers  Dat merk je door de mensgerichte manier waarop wij elkaar benaderen en aan het feit dat wij elkaar graag verder helpen en samen denken in oplossingen  Wij geloven bovendien dat positiviteit onze sleutel tot succes is  Jij past bij ons als jij je daarin herkent en net als wij wil gaan voor het motto   alles voor een enthousiaste klant    Alvast een kijkje achter de schermen  Bekijk de video  Wat jij kan  Je bent succesvol als Data Analist als je leergierig en behulpzaam bent ingesteld  Verder is het belangrijk dat je denkt in oplossingen voor de klant  voor je collega en voor het bedrijf  Daarnaast kan je het volgende lijstje afvinken  Hbo werk  en denkniveau  gevoel bij bedrijfsprocessen  kennis van en ervaring met SQL  Je hebt ervaring met database management systemen en gegevens analyse  Een flexibele instelling die in onze agile werkomgeving past  Wat bieden wij  De mogelijkheid om jezelf te ontwikkelen  een no nonsense omgeving met collega s die gemotiveerd en kundig zijn  een aantrekkelijke en afwisselende baan binnen een mensgerichte organisatie  Vragen over deze functie  Heb je nog vragen of wil je eerst meer informatie ontvangen  bel dan met Aart Franken op 0341 751111 of stuur je vraag per mail

Organisatie  ICI PARIS XL  onderdeel van AS Watson  is een relatief kleine organisatie met afdelingen zoals Marketing  E commerce  Category management  Finance  Winkelmanagement  en Customer Service  Zij richten zich op het hogere beauty segment  Iets wat een geheel eigen beleving met zich meebrengt  Bij hen verkoop je immers geen dagcrème  maar een lifestyle  De afgelopen jaren hebben ze hard gewerkt om de positie van marktleider te veroveren  Om die positie vast te houden zijn ze altijd op zoek naar trends  innovatie en nieuwe ideeën  Samen zorgen ze voor zichtbaar resultaat in een wereld die snel verandert  Functie  Als CRM Data Analist speel je een sleutelrol binnen de organisatie en ben jij het eerste aanspreekpunt voor alle reporting vraagstukken rondom de markt  klant  business en het hybride kanalenspel  Samen met je stakeholders zoals CRM  e commerce  Marketing  Category Management  Winkelmanagement en Finance bouw je proactief mee aan een data gedreven organisatie  In de dagelijkse praktijk ben jij onder andere bezig met   monitoren  analyseren  en interpreteren van de markt  klant  business en kanaaldata en rapportages om verkregen inzichten vervolgens door te vertalen naar concrete aanbevelingen en deze te presenteren aan de gehele organisatie  ontwikkelen  automatiseren  en continue verbeteren van klant  business en kanaal analyses  rapportages en dashboards  ad hoc analyses en data science voor diverse afdelingen  belangrijke bijdrage leveren aan de opzet en ontwikkeling van CRM en e commerce tools en  databases  opstellen van jaarlijkse CRM targets voor onze filialen en webstores  sparren met junior analisten  In deze functie maak je deel uit van het data analisten team binnen het CRM team  rapporteer je aan de manager CRM Benelux en heb je regelmatig afstemming met andere analisten uit het e commerce en Online Marketing team  Je levert een proactieve bijdrage aan de groei van de organisatie en krijgt volop mogelijkheden om je te ontwikkelen binnen de rijke en gevarieerde AS Watson groep  Functie eisen  Je hebt een master diploma in een analytische of digitale afstudeerrichting  Je hebt minimaal 4 jaar ervaring als data analist in een Retail of digitale omgeving  Je bent gedreven om iedereen de kracht van data te laten zien en te ervaren  Je bent niet alleen analytisch sterk  maar ook communicatief vaardig  leergierig  probleemoplossend en resultaatgericht  Je bent in staat om data in commerciële kansen om te zetten  Je hebt een bewezen trackrecord met analyse tools zoals BO  Tableau  SQL  Google Analytics  360  en datavisualisatie  Aanbod  Een baan bij een succesvolle  krachtige en dynamische internationale organisatie met mooie merken die continu in beweging is  We geven je één garantie  saai is het bij ons nooit  Een goed salaris dat past bij jouw werk  en denkniveau en ervaring en verder o a  24 vakantiedagen  een aantrekkelijke ATV regeling met 19 5 dagen op fulltime basis en  omdat jij natuurlijk fan bent van hun winkels en producten krijg je ook nog een personeelskorting op aankopen bij onze winkels van ICI PARIS XL  Kruidvat en Trekpleister  De mogelijkheid om gedurende het jaar zelf te bepalen of je meer vrije tijd of liever extra inkomsten wilt hebben  Door onze flexibele arbeidsvoorwaarden kun je vakantiedagen kopen en verkopen en of  deels  ATV uit laten betalen  Een enthousiast team dat staat te popelen om kennis met jou te maken  Volop ontwikkelings  en doorgroeimogelijkheden  door de groei en het succes van onze organisatie bieden ze talent altijd een mogelijkheid voor verdere ontwikkeling of om door te groeien in de toekomst  Een eigen A S  Watson Academy met een breed aanbod aan trainingen en cursussen  Een informele  no nonsense manier van werken  resultaat telt  maar vooral ook respect voor elkaar en een goede sfeer  Bij AS Watson investeren ze niet alleen in een goede arbeidsvoorwaarden en  omstandigheden  maar ook in hun collega s  Je werkt niet alleen bij hen  maar ze bieden je ook de mogelijkheid te groeien naar het niveau waar jij het beste tot je recht komt  Solliciteren  Ben je na het lezen van deze vacature enthousiast geworden  Dan ontvangen we graag jouw sollicitatie  Voor vragen of meer informatie over onze organisatie en de functie kun je contact opnemen met Stefan van Rumpt  Stefan van Rumpt 06 46993272   s v rumpt cmotions nl

Will you be our next TIP colleague  Are you looking for a challenging workplace where you can work with professional and energetic colleagues  Who are passionate about what they do  and who are committed to deliver excellence every day  All in a work environment where safety and wellbeing in the workplace is our primary care  team spirit is fostered and integrity is at the core of our business  With operations throughout Europe and Canada we provide many opportunities for your professional growth  Job Description Data Analytics Intern De Entree 33  1101 BH Amsterdam  The Netherlands This role will support TIP s Data and Analytics team  working within one of our agile squads  this role will be exposed to a broad range of Data Analytics  Engineering and Analytics initiatives while supporting internal and external data customers  Your activities will consist of  Developing engaging dashboards  reports and visuals using PowerBI for internal and external stakeholders Developing ETL pipelines  using stored procedures  DAG s  and scripts  Collaborating with your squad to help design and implement core data models for your squad s business domain Working with the data architect and data engineers to enhance deployment and certification pipelines Supporting the product team with ad hoc analysis to identify opportunities for new data products Experimentation with ML  Statistical or operations research models combing telematics  operational and financial data We are looking for someone with the following  Currently pursuing a degree in BSc MSc in Computer Science  applied mathematics  data science  statistics  analytics  or related discipline Academic  personal  or professional experience with Python  SQL  and PowerBI Solid understanding of data management and data structures Solid grasp of spoken and written English Only applicants with legal authorization to work in the European Union  either studying at a university in the Netherlands or EU EEA residency will be considered You will be a great fit if you  Are passionate about data  and eager to implement techniques from your degree in a production environment Are proactive and naturally take ownership of tasks  able to handle projects independently Comfortable engaging directly with business stakeholders to clarify requirements  and suggest improvements to existing ways of working Have some familiarity with the Azure suite of products including Synapse Analytics  Azure Functions  PowerBI  DevOps TIP is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in its workforce  encouraging applications from all qualified individuals  Hiring is subject to a satisfactory reference check  Application Please click on  Apply  to upload and submit your personal details and CV   LI POST

job_desc: Company Description Sia Partners is a next generation management consulting firm and pioneer of Consulting 4 0  We offer a unique blend of AI and design capabilities  augmenting traditional consulting to deliver exceptional value to our clients  With 2 200 consultants in 18 countries and expertise in more than 30 sectors and services  we optimize client projects worldwide  Through our Consulting for Good approach  we strive for next level impact by developing innovative CSR solutions for our clients  making sustainability a lever for profitable transformation Sia Partners Netherlands In 2009 the office in Amsterdam was opened  which is now situated at the 28th floor of the Rembrandt Tower with a great view on the city of Amsterdam  We focus on the following sectors  Energy   Utilities  Financial Services  Marketing   Customer Experience  Data Science and HR  Transformation   Change  The Dutch team is experiencing strong growth and has now built up an impressive client portfolio  supported by and cooperating with colleagues from our international offices  Sia Partners Netherlands employs approximately 55 consultants  Job Description The Amsterdam Data Science team  currently 8 data scientists engineers  is young  diverse and growing  As we are still relatively small you will be in the driver seat to shape its future  We have a flat structure and value the entrepreneurial spirit of our members  initiative is highly encouraged  We are also striving for well being  diversity and knowledge sharing inside the team  so that we all grow  We want to expand our capabilities in the risk domain and are currently looking for at least 3 new risk data scientists to join our team  As a risk data scientist you will be working on various client projects as well as on building our own Sia AI solutions  together with our French Data Engineering team and the Financial Services business units of Sia Partners Global  You perform complex analyses  build or improve risk models  identify business needs and create relevant solutions and action plans  You work on structural solutions for our clients and to that end you ensure that your work is understandable  well documented and reusable  If there are any commercial opportunities within your expertise  you notice and develop these together with the team  Since you are the expert in the field of Risk  you take initiative and are not afraid to guide other consultants from your team in achieving deliverables and facilitate personal development  You will actively participate in knowledge sharing  code reviews and deep dives to develop the ambitious team that you are part of  Qualifications You hold a Master s Degree with a strong quantitative component  e g  Econometrics  Physics  Mathematics  Statistics  Quantitative Finance  You have 1 3 years of relevant experience in the financial services sector  e g  credit risk  portfolio management  assessing regulations  trading strategies  You have deep understanding of modelling techniques used within the risk domain and are capable to communicate and explain your knowledge to different audiences You are a true problem solver  you turn complex issues into simple business understandable solutions You have excellent interpersonal and team working skills Strong coding skills in at least Python  other programming languages are a plus Good experience with database management languages  e g   SQL  PostgreSQL  Consulting experience is a plus  Proficiency with unix based command line and DevOps tools  Git  Docker  Kubernetes   big data Tiqets is one of the fastest growing tech scale ups in the Netherlands  To keep it moving fast and making culture more accessible  we re hiring a Merchandising Data Analyst to join us   Full time   Amsterdam Who are we   We re revolutionising the way people buy tickets to cultural venues and attractions all over the world  Our technology lets users easily book the best tickets in seconds  meaning customers can enter museums  zoos  theme parks  and more easily than ever   We re dedicated to bringing simplicity to the world of travel and entertainment  If you want to join our team  working as our Merchandising Data Analyst  send us your CV  We might be looking for YOU   Our values Be accessible  Help out  communicate honestly  and be there for each other  Be remarkable  Have fun  think creatively  and celebrate great moments together  Skip the line  Be fast  flexible  and smart  take responsibility and push forward  Life at Tiqets What you will do As part of the Data team and supporting the Merchandising team  you are the one looking for new insights and opportunities to increase business performance by analysing our wealth of data  Whether it s about exploring which new categories to add that best complement our current assortment or learning which price points work better for a newly released upsell feature  There s still a lot to learn and explore in this new focus area of Tiqets and you re a part of this journey  You re very analytical  entrepreneurial  customer obsessed  and want to make an impact  In your first six months you ll be helping not just the Merchandising team  but the entire company become more customer centric by providing insights in the full customer buying journey  so bring your data presentation and stakeholder management skills   Additionally  you ll be a core part of the team that manages the Playbook  our data driven action plan which aligns all departments of the company  ranging from Supply to Demand and everything in between  You ll help with constantly validating whether those actions have the right impact and increase the growth rate  So if you re up for transforming the company with insights  we d love to chat with you   Responsibilities Exploring data to generate new insights and opportunities to increase business performance  We re always looking for new stuff  Partner with our 4 data analysts   3 data scientists to deep dive in data sets  for example to do predictive analysis to get a better understanding of future customer buying behaviours  Explore and set up the pricing and availability domains with a new strategy and development roadmap  Continuous tracking of results from actions and optimisations and providing feedback to the responsible executors  Regular monitoring and analyses of our markets  tracking progress towards team and company goals  and reporting on KPIs  Build dashboards and reports to provide both ad hoc and recurring insights to make sure we make the right decisions  Requirements Technical or mathematical education at a Bachelor or Master level 3  years of experience in analyst roles Experience in CRO  pricing  merchandising  e commerce and or digital marketing Experience using Business Intelligence tooling to dive into data and find pertinent insights to help reach improve your business goals Strong SQL skills and understanding of data structures Experience with Web Analytics tools  Google Analytics  Mixpanel  Amplitude  etc   is a plus Understanding of the basics of A B testing is essentialExperience within a fast moving company where you were able to thrive in uncertainty and deliver business value with good business judgement  problem solving and follow through skills Ability to switch between ad hoc analytical tasks and a structured project based approach  working independently on business critical tasks as well as in multi disciplinary teams Excellent communicator  being able to translate data into stories Living in the Netherlands EU Perks   Benefits at Tiqets Young  energetic  international work environment  Bright  welcoming office located in the centre of Amsterdam Competitive salary and paid holiday leave Tiqets learning academy  skill lab  group   individual learning Pension contribution and travel compensation Annual company getaway to undisclosed location Sports activities  free gym  running sessions  boot camp  football  climbing and more Fun  sociable company events in and out of the office 20  employee discount code to explore great museums venues worldwide Everyone   employed at Tiqets will receive a monthly contribution for working from home Everyone   employed at Tiqets can reimburse home work space necessities Meet the Merchandising Team

Aegon is increasingly becoming data driven  This also applies to HR  Hence  the global HR Digital Experience team has taken on the challenge to take a leading role in making people and organization structure decisions data driven  aligned with the Aegon business strategy and HR agenda  The last years important steps have been taken by developing key cornerstones in data and analytics  data science on engagement  turnover and equal pay  key HR metrics to provide critical management information and building a strong continuous listening strategy  accompanied by business relevant reports and dashboards  Critical steps have been taken in realizing the ambition to become more data driven  fueled by structural infrastructure initiatives like a global data lake and technology stack  2022 and beyond is the time to build even more momentum  To further develop the ambition the Global HR Digital Experience team is looking for a HR Data Analyst who can take data drive insights for HR to the next level in line with the business strategy  Key topics we will focus on are talent  workforce planning  attrition and retention  engagement  inclusion and diversity  There is the strong ambition to move towards a predictive analytics environment  while ensuring the basics are in place  The position will report to the Global Head of HR Digital Experience and will be part of our global people analytics team  extended by our satellite  People  Analytics teams in our core markets  United Stated  United Kingdom and Netherlands   You will work closely with our People Data and Analytics Lead in realizing our ambition  hereby providing key support from an analytic design  insights  reporting and technology angle  Together with the People Analytics Lead you will build and materialize the global people analytic capability  working closely with global and RU resources to find common ground on data science  business intelligence and employee research challenges in a hub   spoke model  As analyst you will be in the center of the global center of expertise and be positioned as SME on People Analytics  Within the global team you will work next to the lead with our Survey and Research team  Product Owner HR Technology and Digital Transformation Lead  The analytic capability will be responsible for Data Management  Research   Surveys  Business Intelligence  Data Science and Analytics regarding people and organization structure matters  Success in these core fields depends on a number of catalysts and need to be managed in parallel  technology  governance  capabilities  leadership and privacy   ethics  The person for this role will have around 4 years of relevant work experience  What work you ll be doing Building the global People Analytic capability  Set up shop  together with the People Analytics Lead to create a true global People Analytics capability  Pro actively help with the identification of business challenges and opportunities for the global Aegon organization  identify the people component and determine how it can be addressed using a data driven approach  Develop People Analytics project plans  including the coaching of RU analytic teams  but also technical resources  Data Privacy officers and senior management  Embed the global governance model to leverage the global analytic capability Be an inspirator for the satellite analytic teams  create a common ground on analytical insight and create the conditions to excel  Establish yourself as trustworthy partner for senior leadership  data privacy and legal officers to allow a strong foundation for research and insights  Continuously seek out industry best practices and develop skills to create new capabilities for data science and BI analysis to improve people decisions  Actively build the insight driven HR community by socializing articles  sharing internal and external best practices  developing and facilitating learning   development opportunities Business Intelligence   Reporting Capture the demand  flesh out business requirements maintain and expand the HR BI backlog  Set priorities in alignment with the People Analytics Lead  Create  yourself or via other experts  and maintain interactive dashboards in PowerBI and other visualization tools  Coordinate among different data sources and with functional application managers and data owners  Unlock data from different operational tools  Workday  Learning Tooling  Survey Tooling etcetera   etc    bring data from various repositories together and extend the repository  either yourself or via other stakeholders  i e  Global Systems   Work with Data Management and Data Owners to formulate data dictionary and key performance indicator definitions to accelerate data driven HR  Create an insight driven culture via a pro active change mindset and hands on approach to people questions and business analysis  Analytics   Data Science Maintain and expand the HR Analytics backlog  determine priorities  and formulate analytics projects  Lead the Privacy Impact Analysis  PIA   Collect  link  structure  manipulate internal and external  structured  and unstructured data through statistical preliminary  findings with subject matter experts and or present findings to business sponsor and other stakeholders  Train HR business in understanding the potential applications of advanced analytics and the value it can generate  Who you are Master degree with 3 to 5 years of working experience  Interested in people   workforce topics  Excellent research and analytic skills applying through a range of different topics and techniques Experience of collating  interpreting and modeling a range of people data and behavioral models Experience of presenting findings and analysis in  Knowledge and experience of various modeling algorithms e g  regression  tree based  clustering  and time series models  Strong communication skills and able to do storytelling with data  Have a job_desc: The opportunity Amazing Data Analyst   Team Data Analytics ING Collections NL   Will you help us improve our services for customers in financial difficulties through the smart use of data  Do you want to contribute to reducing the debt problem in the Netherlands  Are you passionate about making impact  based on data driven insights  Do you enjoy solving problems and do you also want to have an impact on society by doing so  Then we are looking for you  You  as an amazing Data Analyst  will help us realize our ambition of being mobile first  frictionless  relevant and strive to prevent debt a data driven way  This and more can be achieved whilst working in multi disciplinary teams consisting of customer journey experts  other data analysts  data scientists and our operational colleagues  What do we stand for within Collections  Collections NL wants to make a difference by being the partner of customers in financial difficulties  We offer our customers  personal  easy  smart  and customer centric solutions with the help of advanced analytics  By doing so we want to prevent customers from getting into financial hardship  prevention  and to help those with ING product related debts in a sustainable fashion  Even when it comes to debt recovery  more and more customers want to be able to handle everything independently and digitally  while looking for personal and relevant advice when it comes to complex financial issues or problems  Therefore we are improving our customer journeys on a daily basis in order to better serve our customers and more effectively  By doing so we contribute to a sustainable financially fit Netherlands  What does Collections do  Not to sound cliché  but  no day is the same at the innovative Collections department as can be illustrated by some of the topics we are currently working on  Developing a chatbot call bot Analyzing call reasons to better route customers  with the aid of Speech Analytics Segmentation and probability to default models with custom customer journeys Predictive models to be able to detect debt and possibly nudge preventively Digitization initiatives to improve the customer experience within self service Data driven approach in measuring the effectiveness all used tools for debt recovery Collaborations with the AFM  Nederlandse Schuldhulproute and also other ING countries acting on our social responsibility as an institution  striving for sustainable debt prevention and recovery The team We are 5 data analysts who have a crucial and decisive role within the tribe  where we are responsible for maximizing the impact of Collections based on data driven decisions and proactive analyses and advice  Think about analyses such as the efficiency of debt collection within NL compared to other countries  what we can learn from others  What tools or measures can we use to get and keep customers out of arrears  Feel free to reach out for more info on the team  Roles and responsibilities You know that success is a team effort You have an ambitious pro active and positive mentality You generate  analyze and present relevant customer insights and enable personal and relevant customer interactions through smart data analysis Standard reports are entrusted to our data warehouse team who made our data mart  They also build the reports in Cognos  so you can primarily focus on analysis  Your competencies A master s degree in the field of analytics  mathematics  econometrics or other analytical studies Bridgebuilder  understand data and translate the insights into actions for your stakeholders   2 4 years of demonstrable experience with data analysis via e g  SQL  SAS  Excel  Cognos  R  Python You like to participate in fun activities with the team and department    You like to continuously develop yourself You take initiative but you value cooperation just as much How to succeed We hire smart people like you for your potential  Our biggest expectation is that you ll stay curious  Keep learning  Take on responsibility  In return  we ll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself  Rewards   benefits We want to make sure that it s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life  You can find out more about our employment conditions at https   www ing jobs netherlands Why ING benefits htm The benefits of working with us at ING include A salary tailored to your qualities and experience24 27 vacation days depending on contractPension scheme13th month salaryIndividual Savings Contribution  BIS   3 5  of your gross annual salary8  Holiday paymentPersonal growth and challenging work with endless possibilitiesAn informal working environment with innovative colleaguesWork Agile  so new ideas come to life faster Interested  Please upload your CV and motivation letter by clicking the  Apply  button  About us With 57 000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries  there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business  Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what s possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer s interests at heart  Do you want to be surrounded by progressive  inspiring  diverse and supportive colleagues  Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING  Join us  Apply today

job_desc: About Apeiron Insight Apeiron Insight is a data driven research   analytics company  providing insights   data products to investment companies for them to make better informed  investment  decisions  The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise  We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling   Machine Learning  Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines  Your role at Apeiron Insight We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors  You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research  The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models  perform data analysis  write reports  update marketing materials  and service client requests  The individual should be proficient with Excel  mathematical modeling  and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting  Experience with Python  SQL  or R is highly preferred  The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator  Additionally  the candidate must be self motivated  detail oriented  and a creative thinker who has interest   curiosity in the intersection of  alternative data   investment research  and financial markets  Responsibilities Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector  Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights  Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources  including  but not limited to  proprietary datasets  company documents and materials  SEC regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks  industry publications  and online data services  Write  edit  and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models  Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy  Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests  Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases  What are we looking for  Functional understanding of data analysis using Python  SQL or R is a must  Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners  Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business industry trends based on use of alternative data  Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data  Self starter who works well in a fast paced environment  Team player  happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering   the Management team  You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English  verbally and in writing   Command of the Dutch language is a plus  Enjoy working in a cool   stylish office  overlooking the Hague  with excellent facilities  We also really appreciate  Strong mathematical and statistical background  An intuitive understanding of business problems  What to expect  We believe in commitment  your permanent contract will be waiting for you  Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities   experience  Bonus scheme  8  holiday payment  25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week  Personal education study budget  An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best  Based in Rijswijk  of course in  hybrid mode   working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work  If you think this position fits you well  we sincerely hope to hear from you  If so  please submit your resume and motivation letter

Met jouw analyses en rapportages het werk van  assistent  accountants op de controlepraktijk efficiënter en effectiever maken  Dat is wat je doet als data analist bij Vermetten  Combineer jij technische skills met een ijzersterk analytisch vermogen  En hou je ook nog eens van pionieren en bouwen  Solliciteer dan direct op deze nieuwe functie binnen de controlepraktijk   Wat doe je als data analist   De wereld bestaat uit gigantische hoeveelheden data  En daar ga jij mee aan de slag  Door de standaardisatie en voorbereiding van data analyses en rapportages ondersteun je het audit team in hun werkzaamheden  Jouw analyses geven inzicht in de belangrijkste geldstromen binnen een jaarrekening en wijzen op de risicogebieden  Zo weten de  assistent  accountants direct waar ze op moeten focussen bij het uitvoeren van de controle  Je schakelt makkelijk tussen IT Data science en de dagelijkse business  Enerzijds ben je verantwoordelijk voor het meedenken over data analyse op strategisch niveau en anderzijds ben jij degene die de bouw en implementatie van data analytics toepassingen realiseert  Je houdt je daarnaast bezig met data extractie en het uniformeren van data analyses  De functie van data analist is nieuw bij Vermetten en het is aan jou om deze rol verder vorm te geven  Pionieren  experimenteren  rapportages maken en richtlijnen opstellen hoort dus ook bij jouw werkzaamheden  Sterker nog  hier zou je juist heel veel energie van moeten krijgen  Je houdt ervan om te bouwen  Je bent enorm analytisch  maar tegelijkertijd ook sociaal en communicatief sterk  Je kunt snel je weg vinden in BI tools en ziet er een uitdaging in om grote hoeveelheden data duiding te geven  Je houdt van vrijheid in je werk en neemt graag het initiatief  Daarnaast vind je het interessant om ondernemers te helpen bij hun financiële bedrijfsvoering  Op jouw cv zien we graag   Een afgeronde hbo  of wo opleiding in de richting van Finance   Control   Bedrijfseconomie  Wiskunde The Role Where you fit in Shell Trading integrates a worldwide trading network with an unsurpassed global portfolio in crude oil  refined products  natural gas  electrical power  and chemicals  It has larger locations in London  Houston  Calgary  Singapore  Dubai  Rotterdam  and Barbados  Shell Trading is one of the world s largest energy traders and is a key segment of the Shell portfolio  Shell Energy Europe  SE EE  sells and actively trades energy related products and services associated with European natural gas  power  and environmental products  SE EE was created in 2009 through the combination of Shell s marketing and trading companies in Europe  SE EE is part of Shell Energy which is the commercial heart of the Integrated Gas Business and aligns all Energy Trading activity throughout the world  As part of the SE EE and NEs growth strategy  Power and Gas wholesale and customer activities are scaling significantly in existing and expanding into new market areas and deal types  This involves a significant amount of work on selecting  integrating  and maintaining new systems and processes  Shell Energy Europe Ltd   SE EE  acts as the Balancing Responsible Party  BRP  for renewable assets operated across Europe  This involves consolidating for varying local markets long and short positions to net off imbalance positions  minimise value leakage  and maximise value creation opportunity against the system price  Data is critically important in this process to inform optimisation of forecasts and to predict system buyout price  Different markets have different regulatory regimes related to the balancing market and a deep understanding of each market is critical to ensure continued license to operate for SE EE  and maximising value for the end to end business  This role in SE EE will be based in The Netherlands which means that this role will officially be part of Shell Nederland BV  What s the role  The primary accountabilities of the Renewable Data Analyst  Power  are  Work in a team of multiple Data Analysts to validate and correct data to support business critical processes  Keep track of Shell Energy Europe Ltd  s Portfolio in SE EE s data management solution for NL BRP  Collect  process  and analyse operational data  including allocation  reconciliation  and measurement data  in order to report to internal and external stakeholders  Troubleshoot issues with internal and external counterparties  including Dutch Grid Operators  Anomalies in generation and consumption patterns investigated and understood  Actively manage relationships with internal and external stakeholders  including relevant market organizations  Facilitate necessary management approvals  Work to standardise  and automate as many of these processes as possible in conjunction with IT  Understand the deal funnel to assess and manage the workload associated with integrating new opportunities into relevant systems Deep understanding of balancing regimes in country  well connected with regulatory bodies  able to understand upcoming regulatory changes and able to coordinate teams to implement system and process changes ahead of new introduction of new and or changed rules  What we need from you  The successful candidate would be required to  Be inspired by and committed to the success of Shell in the Energy Transition  Be comfortable with big  complex data sets  analysis  and application of that data to drive business value  Can process large data sets through building own queries to support resolve complex issues and support decision making  Show a keen interest in IT digitalization and other technology advancements and how these can be applied to drive competitive advantage in Shell  Understand the end to end Life of a Deal process in SE EE  Excellent customer service attention manner  Ability to scope and manage changes to IT projects and drive process improvements  Have experience in regulatory reporting frameworks for Power in Europe  demonstrating an interest in balancing regimes  Develop business relationships with customers and IT vendors  Operate effectively as part of a team as well as autonomously  Adapt quickly to a dynamic environment and demonstrate resilience under pressure  The successful candidate should also possess the following skills  Very strong interpersonal and communication skills  fluent in spoken and written Dutch and English   Excellent stakeholder engagement  Highly analytical  data driven with strong attention to detail  Process Improvement mindset  A basic knowledge of Trading and Supply European Power Operations  Trade Finance and Controls  European Regulatory Reporting and Compliance  COMPANY DESCRIPTION Shell Nederland BV is a platform for international collaboration  with Shell offering direct employment to around ten thousand people in the Netherlands alone  including roughly 2 800 non Dutch employees from around 80 countries  Diversity is key at Shell Nederland  and our employees reflect the innovation that stems from a diverse workforce  By joining Shell Nederland  you will benefit from an unrivalled industry leading development programme that will see you tap into a pool of expert knowledge that will help propel your career  Shell Nederland is the holding company of most Shell companies operating in the Netherlands  Shell Nederland also has an advisory and coordinating role in numerous areas  An innovative place to work There s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell  Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today  bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet  whilst managing the risks of climate change  Join us and you ll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future   whether by investing in renewables  exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently  An inclusive place to work To power progress together  we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard  Here are just some of the ways we re nurturing an inclusive environment   one where you can express your ideas  extend your skills and reach your potential  We re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process  workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles  Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply  and we ll take it from there  We re closing the gender gap   whether that s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology  We re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace  promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity  We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance  We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application  A rewarding place to work Combine our creative  collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice  We re huge advocates for career development  We ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings  By pushing people to reach their potential  we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had  or make career moves they never thought possible  Disclaimer Please note  We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time  including prior to the advertised closing date  Before applying  you are advised to read our data protection policy  This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal Dutch Shell Group companies around the world  The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell  Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand  Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Heb jij kennis van financiële applicaties en maak jij nieuwe systemen jezelf snel eigen  Krijg je er energie van om  data processen steeds verder te optimaliseren  En heb je affiniteit met de Nederlandse land  en tuinbouwsector  Wageningen Economic Research voert projecten uit voor overheden  bedrijven en ondernemers  Een belangrijk project is de verzameling van financiële  en duurzaamheidsgegevens van agrarische bedrijven  Het is onze ambitie om deze dataverzameling zo efficiënt mogelijk te laten verlopen en steeds verder te automatiseren  Zo realiseren we steeds vaker slimme koppelingen met de financiële software pakketten waar agrarische ondernemers mee werken  zoals  boekhoudpakketten  elektronische factuursystemen en online dataregistratiesystemen   Als Data Steward vervul je een belangrijke sleutelrol in dit proces  Jij zorgt er namelijk voor dat we het importeren  bewerken  verwerken  verrijken en ontsluiten van de data zorgvuldig en efficiënt doen  En je denkt proactief mee hoe we dit steeds beter kunnen doen  Wat betekent dat in de praktijk  je beheert de machtigingen tot externe databronnen en onderhoudt de relaties met onze contactpersonen  Je denkt mee in oplossingen bij technische storingen in de systemen en of kwaliteits issues met de externe data  je downloadt en importeert gegevens uit verschillende systemen en draagt zorg voor een correcte automatische verwerking hiervan  Voor e facturen  bijv  XML bestanden  onderhoud je de achterliggende artikelcode koppelingen  PDF facturen verwerk je met scan  en herken software  Scansys  en je onderhoud de onderliggende templates  je deelt intern kennis en informatie over de juiste bewerking en verwerking van externe data aan collega s die verantwoordelijk zijn voor de dataverzameling  Je geeft hen inhoudelijk support  beantwoordt hulp  en adviesvragen en begeleidt hen in de transitie naar digitale gegevensverzameling  je vervult intern een brugfunctie naar onze IT specialisten  Samen met hen zorg je voor een goede geautomatiseerde verwerking van de externe data in ons zelf ontwikkelde data invoersysteem  ARTIS  en de ontsluiting via ons nieuw in ontwikkeling zijnde DataWareHouse systeem  Behalve dat je in staat bent om mee te denken over automatiseringsvragen en oplossingen  voer je zelf ook eenvoudige aanpassingen door in onze invoerschermen  controleregels en modellen  Wageningen Economic Research bestaat uit zeven expertisegroepen  De functie van Data Steward valt binnen de expertisegroep Bedrijveninformatienet  BIN   Met ruim 60 medewerkers zijn wij gespecialiseerd in het verzamelen en administreren van de financiële cijfers en duurzaamheidsgegevens van circa 1 500 land   tuinbouw   visserij  en bosbouwbedrijven in Nederland  Deze gegevens worden onder andere gebruikt voor onderzoek gericht op gezonde en duurzame voedselproductie  Meer informatie over ons BedrijvenInformatieNet vind je hier  werkenbijBedrijvenInformatieNet  En wil je direct al een indruk krijgen van deze functie  Bekijk dan zeker onze bedrijfsfilm  Als het gaat om arbeidsvoorwaarden zit je goed bij Wageningen University   Research  Highlights uit onze CAO zijn bijvoorbeeld  werktijden die in overleg kunnen worden vastgesteld  zodat een optimale balans tussen werk en privé mogelijk is  de mogelijkheid om door meer te werken  maximaal 40 uur per week  extra vakantie uren op te bouwen  sabbatical leave  studieverlof en betaald ouderschapverlof  er is veel aandacht voor vitaliteit en je kan  tegen een geringe vergoeding  gebruik maken van de op de campus in Wageningen aanwezige sportfaciliteiten  een structurele eindejaarsuitkering van 4   per december 2021   uitstekende pensioenregeling via ABP  Bij deze uitstekende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden hoort natuurlijk ook een passend salaris  Wij bieden afhankelijk van je ervaring  een marktconform salaris van minimaal  2 692  tot maximaal  3 674   bij een volledige werkweek van 36 uur conform CAO Wageningen Research  schaal 8   Wanneer je nog niet volledig voldoet aan de functie eisen  kan aanloopschaal 7 van toepassing zijn  Bovendien is een aanstelling van 32 uur per week bespreekbaar  Bij ons is het mogelijk om hybride te werken  standplaats voor deze functie is Wageningen of Den Haag en daarnaast kan je  in overleg  gedeeltelijk vanuit huis werken  Wageningen University   Research stimuleert opleidingsmogelijkheden  Je krijgt bij ons een veelzijdige baan in een internationale omgeving met een plezierige en open werksfeer  Wil je een indruk krijgen van de onderzoeksprojecten bij Wageningen Economic Research  waarvoor jij vooral voor nationale projecten gegevens verzamelt  Bekijk dan deze korte video  De missie van Wageningen University   Research is  To explore the potential of nature to improve the quality of life   Binnen Wageningen University   Research bundelen Wageningen University en gespecialiseerde onderzoeksinstituten van Stichting Wageningen Research hun krachten om bij te dragen aan de oplossing van belangrijke vragen in het domein van gezonde voeding en leefomgeving  Met ongeveer 30 vestigingen  6 800 medewerkers en 12 900 studenten behoort Wageningen University unieke Wageningen aanpak  Wij zijn uitgeroepen tot Beste Werkgever in de categorie Onderwijs 2019 2020  Binnen Wageningen University   Research maakt het Wageningen Economic Research samen met het job_desc: Would you like to put your analytics skills to use at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on some interesting machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Liaising with internal and external stakeholders to understand key metrics  examine business and technical requirements  and develop reporting   data applications Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions to stakeholders Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within a data team 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting opportunities   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools Personal and professional development within a fast growing company Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Job Type  Full time
